episodes.title: Camp Pikachu
episodes.plot: The Pichu Brothers are riding back to their hometown.

episodes.title: Gotta Dance
episodes.plot: Team Rocket successfully build a Base in Hoenn, so Jessie and James leave to meet with Giovanni. While waiting for Giovanni to inspect the Base, Meowth and the other Team Rocket Pokémon get into mischief.

episodes.title: Find Mew!
episodes.plot: Pikachu and Meowth are searching for Mew.

episodes.title: Pikachu's Island Adventure
episodes.plot: Pikachu and his friends have fun on the beach.

episodes.title: Hikari - Setting Off on a New Journey!
episodes.plot: Dawn has to choose how many, if any, Pokémon she will bring with her to Hoenn. The less she brings, the more Hoenn Region Pokémon she can catch.

episodes.title: Nibi Gym - The Greatest Crisis Ever!
episodes.plot: The Gym oversight organization (PIA) finds out that Pewter Gym Challengers are facing Forrest, who is not a certified Gym Leader. Flint apparently didn't want to send in the paperwork because his wife would rather close down the Gym.

episodes.title: Mewtwo: The Prologue to Its Awakening
episodes.plot: Virgil comes across a man who claims to have been saved by an undiscovered Pokémon called Mewtwo and worries that it is injured. This is a prologue to the "Genesect and the Legend Awakened" movie.

episodes.title: Iris VS Ibuki! The Road to Become a Dragon Master!!
episodes.plot: Iris visits Johto to challenge Clair to a Gym Battle, but first takes the opportunity to show the locals that there's no reason to be afraid of Dragon Pokémon.

episodes.title: Lights! Camera! Pika!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends meet Frank who is making a movie involving Pikachus and they volunteer to help make it.

episodes.title: The Strongest Duo! Citron and Dent!!
episodes.plot: Cilan visits Kalos to sight-see and enters a fishing competition. Clemont uses a fishing machine. Cilan calls it deplorable and dismisses him as ignorant. Although unimpressed with his company, Cilan agrees to being shown around Lumiose.

episodes.title: Pikachu is Born!
episodes.plot: Four years prior to the day he began his Pokémon journey, a six-year-old Ash rushes downstairs to show his mother a poster advertising Professor Oak's Pokémon camp. Seeing her son's enthusiasm, Delia agrees to sign him up but admits he will have to get himself up and make his own way since she has things to do. Meanwhile, in the forested outskirts of Pallet Town, a young Pichu observes his surroundings.

episodes.title: Satoshi and Go, Let's Go by Lugia!
episodes.plot: While Ash travels with his Mother and Professor Oak, Go awaits a special encounter with a legendary Pokemon. Little do these two boys know, their first adventure together is about to begin.

episodes.title: Fushigisou, Isn't it Mysterious?
episodes.plot: Professor Cerise asks Ash and Goh to investigate the sudden appearance of Ivysaur in Vermillion City, but the two researchers disagree on their methods.

episodes.title: Let's Go to the Galar Region! An Encounter with Hibanny!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh head to the Galar region on assignment. During their stopover, some Pokémon steal Ash's backpack--with Ash and Goh's train tickets inside.

episodes.title: Kabigon Became Gigantic!? The Mystery of Daimax!!
episodes.plot: Once they get off the train, Ash and Goh set out on the hunt for Dynamax Pokémon. Meanwhile, a Scorbunny is hot on their trail.

episodes.title: Catch a Lot of Pokémon! The Path to Mew!!
episodes.plot: After learning more about the Pokédex functions on their Rotom Phones from Prefessor Cerise, Ash and Goh head out to catch some local Pokémon.

episodes.title: The Hoenn Region, Site of Fierce Fights! The Battle Frontier Challenge!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh travel to the Hoenn region, where Ash has entered Goh into the Battle Frontier Flute Cup. Their first opponents are Hodge and his Hariyama.

episodes.title: Don't Lose, Pochama! The Drift Ice Race in the Sinnoh Region!!
episodes.plot: After the teams finds an exhausted Piplup, they set out for Snowpoint City in the Sinnoh region to reunite it with its trainer. Team Rocket follows.

episodes.title: The Promise We Made That Day! The Ho-Oh Legend of the Johto Region!!
episodes.plot: The internet is full of reports that legendary Pokémon Ho-Oh has been seen in the Johto region. The researchers head to Ecruteak City to check it out.

episodes.title: The Dragonite Paradise and the Dragonair Ordeal!!
episodes.plot: After a ship's captain reports being saved by a Dragonite, Goh and Ash set out in search of the Dragonite island that they believe exists...somewhere.

episodes.title: Koharu, Wanpachi and Sometimes Gangar Too
episodes.plot: While the laboratory staff deal with a mysterious power outage, Chloe contemplates her future and her relationship with Pokémon.

episodes.title: Dynamax Battle! Leon, The Greatest of Them All!!
episodes.plot: Professor Cerise gives Ash and Goh tickets to the World Coronation Series finals in the Galar region, where the strongest trainers battle for glory.

episodes.title: Ash VS Leon! The Path to Power!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his Gigantamax Pikachu save the World Coronation Series from a Gigantamax Drednaw. As a reward, Leon allows Ash to battle him.

episodes.title: The First Visit to the Unova Region! Raid Battle at the Ruins!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh encounter difficulties when exploring a ruined city in the Teselia region.

episodes.title: It's a Snowy Day, And Where is Cubone's Bone?
episodes.plot: Goh goes back home to find a Cubone who has its bone stolen and wants to help it. Ash tries to give back Goh's present for his parents.

episodes.title: Ash Has Been Cursed...!
episodes.plot: A prankster Gengar has been haunting the Cerise Laboratory for many years. Now aware of the power of Ash and Pikachu, Gengar decides to curse Ash.

episodes.title: Scorbunny, Use Your Flaming Kick! Face Tomorrow!!
episodes.plot: Scorbunny tries to learn a fire attack, which causes friction with Goh, who just wants Scorbunny to keep using the attacks they're familiar with.

episodes.title: Ash Takes Part! The Pokémon World Championships!!
episodes.plot: Ash wants to increase his rank online, which takes him back to Vermilion City.

episodes.title: I Am Ditto!
episodes.plot: A Ditto with a case of stage fright gets some help from the most unlikely of sources.

episodes.title: Go Towards Your Dream! Ash and Go!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh participate in an orientation course as teachers, but their respective goals keep them distracted from teaching the students.

episodes.title: Hit Your Mark, Aura! Ash and the Mysterious Egg!!
episodes.plot: While Battling another trainer, Ash feels a strange sensation. Later on, he and Goh find an unhatched Pokémon egg, and Ash is convinced it was meant for him. After Nurse Joy allows Ash to return home with the egg, he is awoken to see a strange glow radiating from the egg...

episodes.title: Farewell, Raboot!
episodes.plot: Goh's and Raboot's strained friendship is put to the test during a research trip to the Hoenn region.

episodes.title: A Massive Panic! Sakuragi Park!!
episodes.plot: When the Pokémon on Cerise's Laboratory grow hungrier than usual, Ash and Goh suspect it's because someone is stealing their food supply.

episodes.title: A Little Rocket R&R!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket takes a few days off for a little R&R, but they keep crashing onto Ash and Goh who are searching for a giant Pokémon.

episodes.title: A Battle Festival Exploding With Life! VS Mega Lucario!!
episodes.plot: While visiting the Kalos region, Ash reunites with Korrina, for a rematch against her Lucario.

episodes.title: Jump! Koiking/Put it On! Yadoking
episodes.plot: Goh enters his Magikarp in a jumping competition.

episodes.title: Legends of Heroes! Dande's Greatest Battle!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh attend to one of the tournaments in the Galar region. This will further encourage Ash to strengthen his team.

episodes.title: Sobbing Messon
episodes.plot: After meeting a Sobble, Goh catches it. When he used it for a battle, he lost it and have to find it back.

episodes.title: Electrifying Jealousy! Wanpachi's Feelings
episodes.plot: Yamper finds an injured Pidove and brings it to the Cerise family to treat it until its trainer arrives. Then Yamper becomes jealous from the Cerises giving Pidove more attention than it. Chloe then gets reminded of the time when she gets jealous of Yamper getting more attention than her.

episodes.title: The Reluctant Pikachu and the Exasperated Barrierd
episodes.plot: Pikachu starts to become jealous when Ash gives Riolu training sessions instead of him. After Delia took a trip to meet Ash, Pikachu intends to go back to Pallet Town with Mimey tailing him.

episodes.title: Hinbass and the Beautiful Scale
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh help Jinny participate in a talent show for water type Pokémon.

episodes.title: Celebi: A Timeless Promise
episodes.plot: A family road trip takes Goh down memory lane, to when he made his first friend.

episodes.title: Would You Like To Do a Pokémon Trade?
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh attend a Pokémon trading event, where Goh is offered to exchange his Pinsir for a Heracross.

episodes.title: The Solitary Fighter Saito! The Threatening Otosupus!!
episodes.plot: While visiting Saffron city, Ash and Goh drop by the Dojo, where Ash faces against Bea, a Gym Leader from Galar.

episodes.title: I'll Get You, Pikachu!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh go to an area overrunning with Pikachus so Goh can catch one for himself.

episodes.title: Satoshi and Go, Crawl Up From the Sand Hell!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh go into a sandstorm to find out what causes it.

episodes.title: I'm Back! Nice to Meet You, Alola!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh go to the Alola Region to reunite with Ash's friends and Pokémon there.

episodes.title: The Colossal Restoration and the Fossil Pokémon!
episodes.plot: Ash, Goh and Chloe go to the museum of Fossil Pokémon to discover some Fossil Pokémon.

episodes.title: Satoshi VS Saitou! Overcome Octopus Hold!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh go to the Johto Region so Ash can have a rematch with Bea.

episodes.title: VS Thunder! A Legendary Raid Battle!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh look through a huge storm in the sky, meeting Zapdos along the way.

episodes.title: The Great Pikachu Dubbing Operation!/Half, Numacraw.
episodes.plot: Team Rocket try to decipher what Pikachu may be saying through the recordings while Meowth is sick. / Ash and Goh find a Marshtomp stuck in dried soil and has to get it out.

episodes.title: Sword & Shield I: Slumbering Forest
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh return to Galar to investigate reports of Pokémon Dynamaxing in unusual locations. When their train stops due to fog, they disembark and get separated.

episodes.title: Sword & Shield II: Black Night
episodes.plot: While Ash and Leon battle the rampaging Dynamax Pokémon, Goh and Sonia seek answers about the legends of Galar and the Darkest Day.

episodes.title: Sword & Shield III - Mugendina
episodes.plot: As Goh and Sonia unravel the mysteries of Galar's hero legend, Leon suspects Chairman Rose is up to no good.

episodes.title: Sword & Shield IV: The Ultimate Sword and Shield
episodes.plot: Chairman Rose is determined to use the destructive Legendary Pokémon Eternatus to produce unlimited energy, and Ash and Goh are battling hard to stop that from happening.

episodes.title: Battling & Getting! The Revival of Mewtwo
episodes.plot: Ash and Goh go to a remote island to search for Mew.

episodes.title: Pokémon Champion! Gluttony King Decision Battle!!
episodes.plot: Ash, Goh and Team Rocket compete in the food-eating contest for Pokemon.

episodes.title: A Close Call with Practically Pikachu!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket create a plan to use Practically Pikachu as a decoy to capture Pikachu while Ash and Goh are distracted from eating their food.

episodes.title: The Hero Lilliel and the Alolan Cane!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon School class is putting on a play with more twists and turns than they could ever expect!

episodes.title: A Haunted House For Everyone!
episodes.plot: Harper and Sarah are excited to visit a haunted house, and they end up having a bit too much fun!

episodes.title: Sparking Confusion!
episodes.plot: Some unusual activity is occurring around Wela Volcano, but the Ultra Guardians are on the case!

episodes.title: Don't Ignore The Small Stufful!
episodes.plot: While Ash runs an errand to Aether Paradise, a certain trio of troublemakers sets out to catch Pokémon there!

episodes.title: No Stone Unturned!
episodes.plot: A chance meeting with another Trainer gives Ash and Rowlet new battle experiences they never imagined!

episodes.title: Bright Lights, Big Changes!
episodes.plot: Rotom Dex's love of the hit TV show Alolan Detective Laki produces some unexpected results!

episodes.title: We Know Where You're Going, Eevee!
episodes.plot: An ocean-loving Eevee has traveled many miles...and where one journey ends, another is about to begin!

episodes.title: Battling The Beast Within!
episodes.plot: A spur-of-the-moment battle with Tapu Koko results in an unexpected, unbelievable journey for Ash and Pikachu!

episodes.title: Parallel Friendships!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are grappling with an Alola region in a parallel world-and they've appeared just in time to help save it!

episodes.title: Alola, Alola!
episodes.plot: At the start of their break, the Pokémon School students have visitors-and Ash can't believe his eyes!

episodes.title: Heart of Fire, Heart of Stone!
episodes.plot: Misty and Brock continue to enjoy their Alola region vacation, but there are some who would like that to stop.

episodes.title: That's Some Spicy Island Research!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are visiting Poni Island for their school research projects, but they're not the only ones with big plans.

episodes.title: Showdown on Poni Island!
episodes.plot: Ash's research project is all about battling, but who will that battling involve?

episodes.title: Evolving Research!
episodes.plot: As the Pokémon School class continues their research projects on Poni Island, Sophocles and Lana have some big surprises in store!

episodes.title: Run, Heroes, Run!
episodes.plot: Ash and Kiawe challenge Tapu Fini.

episodes.title: Memories in the Mist!
episodes.plot: A visit to Hapu's farm envelops our heroes in an experience they will never forget

episodes.title: A Grand Debut!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon School students have one more research project to complete, and it's sure to generate excitement and electricity for everyone!

episodes.title: Keeping Your Eyes on Ball!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon School class meets a talented Pokémon Golfer named Kahili and her Toucannon, Touckey.

episodes.title: Show Me the Metal!
episodes.plot: The discovery of a metal-eating Pokémon.

episodes.title: Got Meltan?
episodes.plot: After analyzing the data collected by Rotom Dex, Professor Oak confirms the mysterious Pokémon is indeed a new species, which he's named Meltan.

episodes.title: This Magik Moment!
episodes.plot: An appearance on a TV quiz show leads our heroes into a world they only dreamed of.

episodes.title: Beauty is Only Crystal Deep!
episodes.plot: The trainers are attacked by Pheromosa.

episodes.title: The Dealer of Destruction!
episodes.plot: Guzma, the leader of Team Skull arrives with a plan to finish Kukui and his dreams of making his league off. Ash challenges him to a tough battle where it seems that Guzma and Golisopod may have the upper hand.

episodes.title: The Secret Princess!
episodes.plot: An emotional look into the past reveals astounding people and places, and nothing will ever be the same again!

episodes.title: Drawn with the Wind!
episodes.plot: Our heroes' visit to a popular tourist attraction ends up being anything but a breeze!

episodes.title: Aiming for the Top Floor!
episodes.plot: The gang visit an unofficial Pokémon gym.

episodes.title: A High-Speed Awakening!
episodes.plot: Sophocles and Vikavolt are entering a Vikavolt race. When they arrive, Sophocles learns that his rival Horacio is also competing with his newly evolved Vikavolt.

episodes.title: The One That Didn't Get Away!
episodes.plot: What starts as an ordinary fishing expedition turns into a much bigger adventure than anyone could have imagined.

episodes.title: A Recipe for Success!
episodes.plot: When Mallow sets out on a routine errand, little does she know she'll return with much more than she ever dreamed of.

episodes.title: Spying for the Big Guy!
episodes.plot: Giovanni's secretary Matori drops by Alola to see how Jessie and James are doing but Jessie is less than impressed to see her.

episodes.title: A Fiery Training Camp Trick!
episodes.plot: Excitement is building for the upcoming Alola Pokémon League, and the Pokémon School class is ready to train.

episodes.title: Living on the Cutting Edge!
episodes.plot: Someone's been slicing and dicing objects all over Melemele Island: a cabbage at Mallow's Family Restaurant gets chopped up, a golden Viren statue is cut in half, and the trees in Lillie's yard are shaped into perfect topiaries.

episodes.title: A Timeless Encounter!
episodes.plot: While Ash and his Pokémon train for the upcoming Alola Pokémon League, they accidentally startle a nearby Celebi. The Mythical Pokémon flees back in time and brings Ash and Torracat with it.

episodes.title: Pikachu's Exciting Adventure!
episodes.plot: After returning to the present day, Ash and Torracat reunite with Pikachu, Lycanroc, Rowlet, and Meltan - who are all covered in dirt. It turns out the Pokémon had been searching for Ash and Torracat after the pair's sudden disappearance.

episodes.title: Chasing Memories, Creating Dreams!
episodes.plot: Professor Kukui has finally realized his dream of establishing the Alola Pokémon League, and he's excited to welcome everyone to the dedication of the brand-new Manalo Stadium.

episodes.title: The Curtain Rises! The Alola Pokémon League!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends sail to Manalo Stadium.

episodes.title: The Great Fray! Battle Royal 151!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends join the other Alola League participants.

episodes.title: Mao and Suiren! Super Full-Force Friendship Battle!!
episodes.plot: The Alola Pokémon League is down to 16 competitors, and Ash and Faba are set to battle.

episodes.title: Musashi VS Kojiro! Battlefield of Truth and Love!!
episodes.plot: Sophocles follows Ash's advice.

episodes.title: Overcome Junaiper!
episodes.plot: Rowlet is determined to battle Decidueye in Ash's Alola Pokémon League quarterfinals match against Hau, but first it needs some additional training.

episodes.title: Battling on the Wing!
episodes.plot: The Alola Pokémon League quarterfinals continue at a lightning pace, and Ash and Rowlet are in the midst of their battle with Hau and Decidueye.

episodes.title: The Road to the Semifinals!
episodes.plot: As the Alola Pokémon League quarterfinals rage on, Kiawe and Charizard face off against Sophocles and Vikavolt in the third battle.

episodes.title: The Final Four!
episodes.plot: Four Trainers are ready to compete in the Alola Pokémon League semifinals.

episodes.title: Getting Down to the Ire!
episodes.plot: The first match of the Alola Pokémon League semifinals.

episodes.title: The Wisdom Not to Run!
episodes.plot: The second half of the Alola Pokémon League semifinals.

episodes.title: Final Rivals!
episodes.plot: The Alola Pokémon League finals are underway, with Ash facing off against Gladion.

episodes.title: Birth! The Alola Champion!!
episodes.plot: The Alola Pokémon League races toward the finish line.

episodes.title: Z-Move Showdown!
episodes.plot: Just as the Champion of the Alola Pokémon League is crowned, an Ultra Wormhole opens above the stadium, and an angry Guzzlord appears.

episodes.title: Exhibition Unmasked!!
episodes.plot: The exhibition match between Ash and Professor Kukui begins.

episodes.title: A Full Battle Bounty!
episodes.plot: The Alola Pokémon League's exhibition match continues with a dizzying array of Pokémon.

episodes.title: Fiery Surprises!
episodes.plot: With three Pokémon left on each side during the Alola Pokémon League's exhibition match, Ash's Naganadel is up against Professor Kukui's Lucario.

episodes.title: Alola's Strongest Z! Kapu-Kokeko VS Pikachu!
episodes.plot: Ash's exhibition match with Professor Kukui continues, with Tapu Koko having unexpectedly entered the match.

episodes.title: Dreaming of the Sun and Moon!
episodes.plot: Following his Manalo Conference victory, Ash returns home and enjoys breakfast with his Pokémon, Professor Kukui, and Professor Burnet.

episodes.title: Thank You, Alola! Respective Departures!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Pikachu get ready to say goodbye to he Alola region now having made their minds up. Meanwhile Jessie, James and Meowth prepare to say their farewells to Bewear as well as their own members.

episodes.title: Satoshi to Hoshigumo! Fushigi na deai!!
episodes.plot: A vivid dream has set our hero on a mission to find out its true meaning!

episodes.title: Hoshigumo Panic! A Sudden Teleport!!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon School class is sculpting with clay today. But while our heroes muse about various Pokémon and places, they disappear one by one-first appearing at the scenes of their musings, then reappearing back at school.

episodes.title: The Shapeshifting Metamon, Find that 'mon!
episodes.plot: While our heroes explore one part of Aether Paradise, Team Rocket is busy exploring another!

episodes.title: Glazio and Silvady! The Mask of Punishment!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends are off on another big adventure, thanks to Nebby's amazing powers!

episodes.title: Full Force Pose at the Sleepover!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are having a sleepover at Professor Kukui's house, and Professor Burnet agrees to join them. Everyone has a good time, but there are a couple of hiccups during a game of Z-Move poses.

episodes.title: Lilie and Silvady, the Resurrected Memory!
episodes.plot: Lillie is now unable to touch Pokemon again and so Faba kidnaps her so he can try to make her remember those memories again. Meanwhile Gladion scolds Ash for bringing Lillie to him but soon comes under attack from Faba too.

episodes.title: Sauboh's Counterattack! The Kidnapped Hoshigumo!!
episodes.plot: Faba has released Lillie from his demented control but isn't ready to give up yet. Whilst Ash and the others do their regular schoolwork, Faba waits till the time is right and goes after Nebby.

episodes.title: Lively Lilie! A Determined Runaway!!
episodes.plot: Having seen their mother Lusamine being taken away by an Ultra Beast both Lillie and Gladion run away from home in order to find where she was gone while Ash heads to Hala's home to find out what has happened to Nebby.

episodes.title: Revealing the Stuff of Legend!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are determined to rescue Lusamine, and help is coming from unexpected and astounding sources.

episodes.title: Rescuing the Unwilling
episodes.plot: Ash and the others have passed through the Ultra Wormhole thanks to Solgaleo's powers. The place they eventually arrive is the world the Ultra Beasts live in. They make an attempt to rescue Lusamine, but the Pokémon that have been put under the Ultra Beasts' control stand in their way.

episodes.title: Shine, Z-Power Ring! Super Full-Force 10,000,000 Volts!!
episodes.plot: With Lusamine still under control from the Ultra Beasts and with time running out Ash, Lillie and Gladion must think of a solution fast before all hope is gone.

episodes.title: Thank You, Solgaleo! Our Hoshigumo!!
episodes.plot: With Lusamine and everyone now safe, they all head back home welcomed by many. On the very same night Professor Kukui tells Ash something very important.

episodes.title: The Strong Sleeper, Nekkoara's Secret!
episodes.plot: Samson Oak tells everyone the story of how he first met Komala and a surprising but all too familiar face from Kanto plans to ruin it's long deep slumber.

episodes.title: Rotom, Can't Stop the Form Change!
episodes.plot: Ash and professors leave the house to go to the shop.

episodes.title: Don't Cry, Hidoide!
episodes.plot: Mareanie evolves into a Toxapex, and a duel begins.

episodes.title: Mao and Suiren, the Bittersweet Memories!
episodes.plot: Harper and Sarah tell Lana that a Pokémon saved them after they got lost in the woods, Mallow remembers the same thing happened to her and Lana when they were younger. The two friends decide it's time to find this Pokémon.

episodes.title: Lilie Soars Through the Air! The PokéSled Jump Tournament!!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon School students, Professor Kukui, and Kahuna Hala are visiting Mount Lanakila on Ula'ula Island, where they meet Cerah, a star of the Pokémon Sled Jump event.

episodes.title: Set Off! Our Ultra Guardians!!
episodes.plot: Lusamine gives our heroes their first assignment as members of the Ultra Guardians: catch an Ultra Beast named Buzzwole, who emerged from an Ultra Wormhole on Melemele Island.

episodes.title: The Evil Nyarth is an Alolan Nyarth!?
episodes.plot: When Team Rocket encounters an Alolan Meowth, Jessie and James admire its clever demeanor-but our Meowth knows from experience that this lookalike is only looking out for number one.

episodes.title: Blaze, Nyabby! Overthrow Gaogaen!!
episodes.plot: Visiting the Battle Royal Dome, Ash's Litten is excited to meet Incineroar who battles Litten but Litten is soon defeated, causing Ash and Litten to train hard.

episodes.title: Turning Heads and Training Hard!
episodes.plot: The mysterious Masked Royal and his partner Incineroar star in the Battle Royal, an Alolan tradition in which four Pokémon battle until the last one standing is the winner.

episodes.title: Smashing wth Sketch!
episodes.plot: The friends learn about Pokémon Ping Pong.

episodes.title: Love at First Twirl!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are about to welcome an unexpected addition into the family - unexpected in so many delightful ways.

episodes.title: Real Life... Inquire Within!
episodes.plot: Nurse Joy is feeling a bit under the weather today, but we know just the heroes to help her out.

episodes.title: Rise and Shine, Starship!
episodes.plot: A potential disaster threatens the future of the Alola region, but the Ultra Guardians are ready, willing, and able to deal with it.

episodes.title: The Young Flame Strikes Back!
episodes.plot: The survival of Kiawe's family farm may be at stake, but our heroes are up to the challenge!

episodes.title: Dewpider Ascending!
episodes.plot: There are lots of interesting Pokémon for our heroes to discover in Alola, and the one they meet today is no exception!

episodes.title: Sours for the Sweet!
episodes.plot: There's a big baking competition coming up in Alola, and a surprising participant is joining in on the fun!

episodes.title: Why Not Give Me a Z-Ring Sometime?
episodes.plot: When James's Mareanie learns a Dark-type move, Team Rocket realizes this could be their chance to put their Dark-type Z-Crystal to good use. The Boss sends them to Ula'ula Island to get a Z-Ring from the kahuna, who's a former associate.

episodes.title: Tough Guy Trials!
episodes.plot: Ash can't contain his excitement as he arrives on Ula'ula Island for his next grand trial.

episodes.title: Some Kind of Laziness!
episodes.plot: Thanks to Acerola's help, Ash arrives at the Ruins of Abundance, home of the Ula'ula Island Guardian Tapu Bulu.

episodes.title: A Battle Hand-Off!
episodes.plot: Ash has been training hard, preparing for his rematch against Nanu on Ula'ula Island. But when he tells the kahuna he's ready, Nanu has another idea.

episodes.title: Guiding an Awakening!
episodes.plot: Following Ash's victory at the Abandoned Thrifty Megamart, Ula'ula Island Kahuna Nanu agrees to battle him in a grand trial. But there's a catch - Ash must defeat three of Nanu's Pokémon using only one of his.

episodes.title: Twirling With a Bang!
episodes.plot: Ash is back on Melemele Island, watching a fireworks display with his Pokémon School classmates.

episodes.title: Showering the World with Love!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon School students visit Hokulani Observatory.

episodes.title: Not Caving Under Pressure!
episodes.plot: A surprising show of determination leads to a happy outcome for many-in many different ways!

episodes.title: A Young Royal Flame Ignites!
episodes.plot: A rule-breaking battle between the Masked Royal and the Revengers.

episodes.title: All They Want to do is Dance, Dance!
episodes.plot: A rousing Pokémon School class project has everyone out of their chairs, and out on the floor!

episodes.title: Dummy, You Shrunk the Kids!
episodes.plot: When Faba appoints himself professor for the day at the Pokémon School, an unexpected event shows that big adventures can come in small packages.

episodes.title: The Shape Love to Come!
episodes.plot: While out shopping, Ash meets a talented artist named Mina, whose partner Ribombee has an amazing power: it can tell what people and Pokémon are feeling.

episodes.title: The Long Vault Home!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends compete in jumping the highest.

episodes.title: I Choose Paradise!
episodes.plot: Everyone's enjoying their vacation until Team Rocket shows up.

episodes.title: Filling the Light with Darkness!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends deal with the unusually cloudy sky.

episodes.title: Full Moon and Many Arms!
episodes.plot: A mysterious creature has emerged from an Ultra Wormhole and now appears to be threatening Alola, but our heroes are ready to do anything they can to help.

episodes.title: The Prism Between Light and Darkness!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are on a mission to rescue Solgaleo from UB Black's clutches, and what a mission it is turning out to be.

episodes.title: Connect to the Future! The Legend of the Radiant One!!
episodes.plot: The Ultra Guardians are on a mission to save Poipole's world, and everyone and everything depends on them.

episodes.title: It's a Pikachu Outbreak! The Pikachu Valley!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends discover Pikachu Valley.

episodes.title: Kukui's Desperate Situation! Another Royal Mask!!
episodes.plot: It's time for the Masked Royal to face his old rival in the ring, but first, there are a few obstacles to be dealt with.

episodes.title: Alola! The Starting Island, the Starter Pokémon!!
episodes.plot: While on vacation in the Alola region, Ash and Pikachu discover and enroll in the island Pokémon school.

episodes.title: The Guardian Deity Kapu-Kokeko Appears! Challenge, Our Z-Move!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Pikachu are adjusting to life in the Alola region--and it's about to give them a powerful push in a new direction.

episodes.title: Hello, Roto, I'm the Rotom Pokédex, Roto!
episodes.plot: Professor Kukui gives Ash an intelligent Rotom Pokédex that is capable of human speech. Ash goes to find and catch his first Pokémon in Alola, but he instead encounters Team Rocket, who are aided by a wild Mimikyu that despises Pikachu.

episodes.title: It's Mokuroh! Catching Pokémon in Alola!!
episodes.plot: Ash is on the verge of catching his first Pokémon, until Team Rocket swoops in to ruin the day.

episodes.title: Ashimari, Give it Your bALLoon!
episodes.plot: Ash's Pokémon class is off to the sea for some fishing, but Team Rocket has a completely different kind of fishing in mind.

episodes.title: The Shocking and Prickly Togedemaru!
episodes.plot: Ash decides to watch Kukui's house for him. He starts making lunch, but since he's not very good at cooking, he ends up wasting all the ingredients and has no choice but to head to the nearby shopping mall. There, he runs into his classmate Sophocles and the Roly-Poly Pokémon Togedemaru. But suddenly, the shopping mall experiences a blackout and everyone ends up separated from their Pokémon.

episodes.title: That's Why Litten Is a Scamp!
episodes.plot: After an unusual wild litten steals Ash's sandwich, he intends on catching the Pokémon.

episodes.title: Who'll Be in Charge of the Egg?
episodes.plot: Lillie has a Pokémon Egg to care for until it hatches, but will fear get in her way?

episodes.title: The Leader Pokémon is Dekagoose!
episodes.plot: Raticate and Rattata are laying waste to the island's fields. Ash then meets Hala, the Kahuna of Melemele Island. Ash tells Hala he will be attempting the Island Trial. However, Hala then asks him a question and tells him he can only attempt the Island Trial after answering it. Ash is initially unsure what to answer, but manages to find the answer to Hala's question thanks to his classmates' help. And then he's finally given a trial by Hala.

episodes.title: Will the Z-Move Work! Challenge the Grand Trial!!
episodes.plot: Ash is ready to do the grand trial against Melemele Island Kahuna Hala. Will Pikachu and Rowlet beat Hala's Pokemon?

episodes.title: Young Kiawe Had a Farm!
episodes.plot: Ash spent the day and night at Kiawe's farm where they learn a lot from each other and fall in love.

episodes.title: The Sun, the Scare, the Secret Lair!
episodes.plot: While our heroes enjoy a class on the beach, familiar and unfamiliar troubles are brewing behind the scenes.

episodes.title: The Big Alola Pancake Race!
episodes.plot: Ash's classmate, Mallow, tells him about a race where Pokémon work with Pokémon Trainers to carry Pancakes to the goal. He gets really interested in the challenge, and decides to participate together with Pikachu.

episodes.title: Getting to Know You!
episodes.plot: The egg has hatched into an Alolan Vulpix immediately followed by Samson Oak's egg hatching into a Kanto Vulpix. Everyone suggests that Lillie looks after the Alolan Vulpix nicknamed Snowy and despite her fear catches it.

episodes.title: Rocking Clawmark Hill!
episodes.plot: Ash and Professor Kukui find the wild Rockruff who lives with them limping home, covered in scratches and burns, completely exhausted. The next night, they follow it to Clawmark Hill, where two Lycanroc keep watch over the wild Pokémon who come together to battle and train. Rockruff battles a fearsome Magmar but is defeated, and Ash offers to help it learn a new move, Rock Throw. After some serious training with Ash and Pikachu, Rockruff returns to challenge Magmar to a rematch-and this time, it wins! After seeing how well Ash and Rockruff work together, Professor ...

episodes.title: They Might Not Be Giants!
episodes.plot: After practicing with Lana, Popplio has learned how to make a balloon that's big and sturdy enough to carry a Pokémon. In a series of mishaps, Rowlet and Popplio end up together inside the balloon-which gets swept away! They're trying to find their way home when they run into the wild Litten, who agrees to help. Soon, all three of them are trapped in a Team Rocket net, and Meowth wants to recruit Litten to join the gang! With some clever acting, Litten frees the others and sends Team Rocket blasting off just as our heroes are reunited. Ash tries to thank the skittish ...

episodes.title: Crystal-Clear Sleuthing!
episodes.plot: Professor Kukui and Rotom Dex are big fans of the TV show Alolan Detective Laki, and Rotom even has a blond wig so it can pretend to be the star. When Ash's Electrium Z goes missing, Rotom excitedly takes the case! Through video replay, Rotom tracks the Z-Crystal's last known whereabouts to the schoolyard, where Ash and Kiawe were training. Rotom suspects Kiawe ended up with the crystal, but Lillie has another explanation: the video shows Ash putting it in his pocket. Ash remembers that he put the crystal on his nightstand before going to bed-and Pikachu triumphantly ...

episodes.title: A Seasoned Search!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are hungry indeed, but a quest to find the missing ingredient is keeping them that way.

episodes.title: A Guardian Rematch!
episodes.plot: Tapu Koko returns to challenge Ash to another battle to test his Z-Move.

episodes.title: Partner Promises!
episodes.plot: Ash reluctantly tags along with Lana, Lillie, and Mallow at the mall. One store's owner points him toward Treasure Island, a gorgeous place full of wild Pokémon, and offers to lend him her kayak. Soon, he and Pikachu are on their way! After a great day of exploring, swimming, and meeting new Pokémon, they discover a Wimpod stuck in some rocks. Ash tries to scale the cliff to rescue it, but just gets all scraped up until Pikachu recruits an Alolan Exeggutor to give him a lift. Wimpod is freed-and Tapu Lele, Akala's mysterious Island Guardian (who's been secretly ...

episodes.title: Nyabby, Time to Begin the Journey!
episodes.plot: After stealing his groceries again, the wild Litten comes to Ash for help when its friend Stoutland starts to have trouble breathing. Ash struggles to get it to the Pokémon Center...but Stoutland is old, and there's not much Nurse Joy can do. Ash watches over Litten as it mourns for its dear friend, and even Meowth offers a compassionate ear. In time, a beautiful rainbow helps revive the joyful memories, and Litten begins to feel better. Ash invites Litten to join his team to continue the training it started with Stoutland-and after a battle, Litten agrees. The ...

episodes.title: A Shivering Shovel Search!
episodes.plot: Ash and Kiawe are training with Litten on the beach as Pikachu and Rockruff play with a mysterious shovel that seems to be moving around on its own-until it rises out of the sand to reveal a dangerous Sandygast! When Rockruff attacks it, the shovel is launched into the sea, and the furious Sandygast evolves into Palossand and traps Ash and Litten inside! Everyone works together to stop the rampaging Palossand-with a star performance from Snowy-as Popplio and Pikachu venture into the sea to find the shovel. After its shovel is returned, Palossand expresses its thanks ...

episodes.title: Getting the Band Back Together!
episodes.plot: Ash and friends are attending a concert by the wildly popular group Dug-Leo, made up of DJ Leo and his partner, a talented Alolan Dugtrio. Everyone wears blonde wigs in Dugtrio's honor, including Rotom Dex-until its wig is carried off after the show by another fan of the band, an Alolan Diglett! As the band rehearses for their next concert, Dugtrio's three heads start fighting over who gets to be lead singer-and Team Rocket swoops in, posing as a talent agency to lure Dugtrio away! Diglett joins our heroes to track them down, and soon the band is back together-and ...

episodes.title: Alolan Open House!
episodes.plot: It's the Open House day at the Pokémon School, and a surprising group of people has gathered for all the fun.

episodes.title: A Team-on-Team Tussle!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket come across with Team Skull when they fight over a rare crystal. Meanwhile, Ash and his friends learn more about the Z-Crystals and Z-Moves.

episodes.title: So Long, Sophocles!
episodes.plot: Moving to a new place and a new life can be stressful for anyone, and the Pokémon School gang is no exception.

episodes.title: A Glaring Rivalry!
episodes.plot: When Lillie's big brother Gladion arrives on Melemele Island, everyone is excited about the powerful new Trainer in town-particularly Ash, who really wants to battle him! After hearing about Ash's Z-Ring and his battles against Tapu Koko, Gladion agrees to meet up the next morning. The battle is just getting started, with Ash's Rockruff against Gladion's impressive Lycanroc, when Team Rocket swoops in. Gladion and Lycanroc unleash a new Z-Move to send them blasting off again, and Ash is immediately interested in continuing the island challenge so he can get a ...

episodes.title: Pulling out the Pokémon Base Pepper!
episodes.plot: It's the season for our heroes' favorite pastime: Pokémon Base! Professor Kukui has arranged a special lesson for them, complete with a guest coach: Oluolu, the star player of the Magikarp team that just won the Pro League season. After the students' game, Team Rocket shows up to demand a Pokémon Base battle-with the winning team getting the star's autograph. Oluolu teams up with the students, and it's a close match until he unleashes his secret weapon: his Snorlax partner's Z-Move, Pulverizing Pancake! In appreciation for a good game, Oluolu offers Jessie his ...

episodes.title: Lulled to La-La Land!
episodes.plot: A Pokémon School camping trip, complete with a scary campfire story, makes for an experience our heroes will never forget.

episodes.title: The Ol' Raise and Switch!
episodes.plot: An unusual assignment at the Pokémon School gives our heroes a surprising opportunity to learn, grow, and have fun at the same time.

episodes.title: The Island Whisperer!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are preparing for a field trip on Akala Island, and the island kahuna promises to make it a trip to remember.

episodes.title: Treasure Hunt, Akala Style!
episodes.plot: Today at the Akala Island, for Pokémon School, Ash and his friends are going to ride on the Ride Pokémon Stoutland to find some treasure.

episodes.title: Big Sky, Small Fry!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are busy with extracurricular activities on Akala Island, and Ash and Lana are in for a great adventure.

episodes.title: Battle of Fire! Garagara Appears!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes attend the Wela Fire Festival, where Fire-type Pokémon line up to receive the Wela Crown, said to convey the power of the volcano itself! Just as Ash's Litten steps up, a feisty Alolan Marowak steals the crown from Olivia and runs off. Kiawe goes after it, but Turtonator is no match for Marowak's speed! Ash offers to help Kiawe train against a quicker foe, and they come up with a strategy: Shell Smash, a risky move that drops Turtonator's defenses but makes it stronger and faster. In the rematch, Kiawe wins, and Marowak returns the crown-and then decides to...

episodes.title: Currying Favor and Flavor!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are embarking on a mission filled with good taste...and a surprising finish.

episodes.title: Trials and Determinations!
episodes.plot: With the Grassium Z in hand, Ash finally begins his trial battle with Olivia for his next Z-Crystal while being watched by Tapu Lele. Ash pits Rowlet and Rockruff against Olivia and her Probopass and Lycanroc.

episodes.title: Iwanko and the Guardian Deity of the Ruins of Life!
episodes.plot: Following the grand trial, Ash's Rockruff has gone off and disappeared. It has headed off to the Ruins of Life. While the heroes try to search it down, a Pokémon - the Guardian Deity of Akala Island - appears.

episodes.title: Mimikkyu's Disguise!
episodes.plot: Today, with the objective of capturing Pikachu, Team Rocket and Ash face off in a battle. With the loss in the battle, Jessie and Mimikyu get separated from the others.

episodes.title: Mallow and the Forest Teacher!
episodes.plot: It's a challenging day for Mallow and her family restaurant, and emotions are running high.

episodes.title: Balloons, Brionne, and Belligerence!
episodes.plot: Lana and Popplio are working hard to master their Z-Move, but their progress is soon to grow by leaps and bounds.

episodes.title: Mounting an Electrifying Charge!
episodes.plot: With their friends at the Pokémon School, the Battery Pokémon, Charjabug's energy is usable for Ash to participate in a car race. But with a teammate, Sophocles, his Charjabug is not quite that fast with its energy.

episodes.title: Alola at Kanto! Takeshi and Kasumi!!
episodes.plot: A celebratory Pokémon School class trip turns out to be a reunion no one will ever forget.

episodes.title: When Regions Collide!
episodes.plot: Still in Kanto, the group heads to Cerulean City to teach the Alola group about Pokémon Gyms. Having had his last match at Cerulean Gym interrupted, Ash is eager to have a proper match as demonstration, and Kiawe also wants to battle. As such, battles soon begin of Ash VS Misty and Kiawe VS Brock, but when they start to use their Z-Moves, Brock and Misty pull out their trump cards: Mega Evolution.

episodes.title: Z's Explosive Birth! What Lurks in Kalos!!
episodes.plot: Bonnie makes a new friend, Ash runs into an old friend, and a terrifying premonition begins to unfold.

episodes.title: Hot-blooded Hariborg! Puni-chan is Being Targeted!!
episodes.plot: As the gang continue their travels with their new Pokémon friend, "Squishy", a Quilladin appears and falls head over heels for Eevee. Meanwhile, Team Rocket set their sights on capturing Squishy.

episodes.title: Mega Tabunne VS Giga Giga Nyarth!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends run across Nurse Joy, who is stuck in a crevice. When they help her, they discover that Nurse Joy and her Audino do not always get along. Nurse Joy hopes the Mega Stone she found will help create a deeper bond between the two.

episodes.title: Shishiko and Kaenjishi! A Fiery Journey!!
episodes.plot: The gang come across a Litleo arguing with a Pyroar. When they learn it is time for Litleo to become independent, they decide to watch it from afar. However, Team Rocket has other plans.

episodes.title: Pikachu, Sees Puni-chan's Dream!
episodes.plot: As the heroes and Team Rocket go to sleep, a Darkrai appears and casts dream spells on them. This places Pikachu and Meowth in Squishy's dreams. The two begin to see the past and future of Squishy as well as the gang's Pokémon.

episodes.title: Welcome to the Ninja Village! The Legend of the Heroic Gekkouga!!
episodes.plot: The gang meet up with their ninja friend Sanpei, who invites them to his village for a festival. However, they soon get interrupted when a Ninja Army attacks and kidnaps the village's chieftain. An unexpected turn of events happens to Ash's Frogadier.

episodes.title: Decisive Battle in the Ninja Village! Gekogashira VS Kirikizan!
episodes.plot: As the gang fight off the evil ninjas, help soon starts to rise when Ash's Frogadier acquires a mysterious new power.

episodes.title: Dance, Eievui! Its TryPokaron Debut!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are in Couriway Town for Serena's next Pokémon Showcase, and her third Princess Key win is at stake.

episodes.title: Terminus Cave! The Mystery of Z is Set in Motion!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are visiting Terminus Cave with hopes of seeing new Pokémon, but they're not alone.

episodes.title: Eureka and Puni-chan!
episodes.plot: Ash, Serena, Clemont and Bonnie look for Squishy who fled after Team Flare tried to catch it but an encounter with a group of Toxicroak leaves Bunnelby injured.

episodes.title: A Windswept Encounter!
episodes.plot: A gust of wind sends Noibat flying into a Breloom to attacks, leaving Noibat poisoned but a Floette cures Noibat but Breloom has a crush on Floette and sees a rival in Noibat.

episodes.title: Satoshi and Serena! Catch One at the Dance Party!!
episodes.plot: Serena is invited to a dance party for Pokémon performers, and there are many surprises in store.

episodes.title: The Strongest Mega Battle! Gekkouga VS Mega Lizardon!!
episodes.plot: A battle between Sawyer and Ash sees Greninja changing its form which catches the attention of a passing Alain who decides to have a battle against Ash.

episodes.title: The Explosive Ground Force! The Zygarde Capture Operation!!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket are tasked with catching Squishy by Giovanni when they encounter Z2 who is being chased by Team Flare and attempt to catch Z2 for themselves.

episodes.title: The Brigarron from the Wilderness! The Tree-planting Robon!
episodes.plot: Travelling across a desolate land, Ash, Serena, Clemont and Bonnie come across a Robot planting seeds in an attempt to create trees along with its protector Chesnaught but the area is lacking the water required.

episodes.title: The Master Class Trial! What Will You Do, Serena!?
episodes.plot: It's Pokémon Showcase time for Serena, and winning her third Princess Key is on the line.

episodes.title: Thunder and Onvern! The Lightning of Anger!
episodes.plot: Ash, Serena, Bonnie and Clemont come across an injured paramedic who tasks them with delivering medicine to a nearby town only to encounter Zapdos who is on a rampage.

episodes.title: Left and Right! The Kametete's Swaying Heart!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends arrive to check out a gem exhibit only for it to be canceled when a person picks the lock and leaves without stealing anything.

episodes.title: Master Class Is in Session!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon Showcase Master Class is under way, and Serena is competing with friends and rivals galore.

episodes.title: Elle VS Serena! Open the Door to the Future!!
episodes.plot: Serena attempts to battle in the master class with all she has and loses after to the kalos queen

episodes.title: A Bride for Citron!? Eureka's S'il-vous-plaît Panic!
episodes.plot: Bunnelby finds a Buneary and Bonnie tells a girl to marry her brother and she gets interested in Clemont. Bonnie then tries to woo the girl away from Clemont due to her nightmares. After, Team Rocket kidnap the 2 rabbit Pokémon.

episodes.title: Serena Becomes Satoshi! The Strongest Pikachu Showdown!
episodes.plot: Rock guitarist Jimmy and his Pikachu, Spike, are always looking for other strong Pikachu Trainers to battle. But Ash is in bed with a fever, and when Jimmy shows up, Serena decides to disguise herself as Ash, and Pikachu plays along.

episodes.title: Satoshi and Alain! Gekkouga VS Mega Lizardon Once Again!!
episodes.plot: Ash's rematch with Alain. Greninja VS Mega-Charizard.

episodes.title: The Forest's Curse and the White Bokurei!
episodes.plot: Ash and co. find a Pokémon and try to get it back with its group. Meanwhile, Team Rocket, tries to separate the ghost Pokémon from its friends because of the macaroon incident earlier.

episodes.title: Satoshi VS Champion Carnet! VS Mega Sirnight!!
episodes.plot: Diantha visits Ash and battles him, but only to be interrupted by Team Rocket.

episodes.title: Rival Showdown! Satoshi VS Shota!!
episodes.plot: Ash battles Sawyer and loses. They both travel to Snowbelle City to challenge the 8th gym leader.

episodes.title: Eisetsu Gym Battle! Battlefield of Ice!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes and Sawyer arrive in Snowbelle City, and Ash is fired up to win his final badge at the freezing Gym! First up is Wulfric's Abomasnow, whose Ability causes hail to fall on the already-icy battlefield! After Hawlucha fights through it to claim the first victory, Wulfric sends out Avalugg-who slowly recovers from damage when it's hailing. It's an icy combo that proves to be very effective, as Avalugg knocks out Hawlucha and Talonflame, and even defeats Greninja after it syncs up with Ash to become "Ash-Greninja" (as Bonnie calls it). Ash is devastated, and ...

episodes.title: The Bewildering Woods... The Dawn of Evolution!
episodes.plot: Following Ash's defeat at the Snowbelle Gym, some not-so-quiet introspection turns into some real inspiration.

episodes.title: Satoshi Gekkouga VS Mega Yukinooh! Unleash the Giant Water Shuriken!!
episodes.plot: Ash re-challenges Wulfric. Abomasnow evolves into its mega form and Ash wins, setting his sights on the Pokémon league.

episodes.title: Find Melecie! Numelgon and Dedenne!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are visiting the wetland where Ash's friend Goodra now lives when they run into a group of Carbink with a problem-one of their Carbink friends is playing a trick on them, hiding and refusing to come out! Everyone joins the search, but the Carbink are lured into a trap and used as part of a Team Rocket robot! Feeling bad about the trouble it's caused, the mischievous Carbink teams up with Goodra to free its friends and send the villains blasting off again. Meanwhile, Alain has just defeated Gym Leader Korrina for his eighth badge, and he hopes to face a ...

episodes.title: The Explosive Heat at the Mechanical Festival!
episodes.plot: Ash, Serena, and Bonnie are having a tough time keeping up with Clemont! Where is he going in such a hurry? It's the Gadget Festival, where playful inventors exhibit their mechanical creations-and where Clemont is truly in his element! Team Rocket is celebrating with some gadgets of their own, but as usual, their goal is to steal Poke Balls from unsuspecting Trainers. When Ash and friends hear about this scheme, they confront the villains, who attempt to fight back using a Meowth-enhancing gadget that Clemont finds impressive! But when Team Rocket's invention falls a ...

episodes.title: The Kalos League Begins! The Mega Lizardon Showdown: X VS Y!!
episodes.plot: After meeting up with old friends, Ash starts battling in the Lumiose Conference and he faces Alan as first his first opponent..

episodes.title: Mega Jukain VS Raichu! I Received Some Experience Points!
episodes.plot: At the Kalos League, Sawyer and Tierno battle against each other. The winner will battle at the semifinals against Ash or Allan.

episodes.title: The Semifinal Full Battle! Satoshi VS Shota!!
episodes.plot: Ash battles Sawyer in the semi-finals of the Kalos League.

episodes.title: Decisive Rival Battle! Satoshi Gekkouga VS Mega Jukain!!
episodes.plot: Ash competes with Sawyer in the semi-finals of the Kalos League.

episodes.title: Fierce Fighting at the Kalos League! Gather, All of My Passion!!
episodes.plot: The day before the Kalos League finals between Ash and Alain, our heroes meet Alain's young friend Mairin when she rescues Clemont's wayward Chespin! Team Flare is also in Lumiose City, preparing for a secret operation while all eyes are on the League-and Lysandre has plans for Ash once the League is over. Meanwhile, Professor Sycamore, who has been researching Ash-Greninja, shows our heroes an old manuscript describing the mysterious Bond Phenomenon, which requires Trainer and Pokemon to have a particularly close connection. Afterward, Ash rallies his Pokemon for the...

episodes.title: Kalos League Finale! Satoshi vs Alan!
episodes.plot: The Kalos League Final continues and it is getting tense. With Alain just having Bisharp and Charizard left, Ash has the upper hand with Goodra, Pikachu and Greninja still in reserve. With Pikachu already worn out after taking out Tyranitar and Metagross, it may not last long. Who will emerge triumphant in this battle and become the Kalos League Champion?

episodes.title: Kalos League Victory! Satoshi's Greatest Decisive Battle!
episodes.plot: Alan beats Satoshi and wins the Kalos League. Meanwhile, Flare-Dan prepares to move ahead with their plan of controlling Zygarde.

episodes.title: Flare Gang Attack! The Zygarde at the Prism Tower!!
episodes.plot: Fuladari and the Flare-Dan's plan for a beautiful new world has finally begun. Everyone from Satoshi to Alan is caught in the crossfire and soon Satoshi gets captured by Fuladari. Meanwhile Puni-Chan prepares to fight Z-2 in order to snap him out of the Flare-Dan's control.

episodes.title: The Shocking Zygarde VS Zygarde! The Breaking World!!
episodes.plot: Team Flare continues on changing the world and ruining Luminous city. Ash and his friends are in trouble.

episodes.title: Attack on Miare Gym! The Citroid Forever!!
episodes.plot: As Ash and the gang are separated each one is trying to help others in different ways.

episodes.title: The Advancing Megalith! The Kalos Line of Defense!!
episodes.plot: The battle to save Kalos is on, with all the gym leaders assisting in the battle but just as it looks like they have won, Lysandre returns, determined to succeed.

episodes.title: Zygarde Fights Back! The Final Battle for Kalos!!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Starting from Zero! Citron's Decision!!
episodes.plot: The Lumiose Gym has been through a lot, but everyone is working together to get it up and running again. Clembot is back, too, although Clemont hasn't been able to restore its memories. When someone arrives to challenge the Gym, Clembot experiences its first Pokémon battle all over again-and it loves every minute! It asks Clemont to teach it all about Pokémon, and he's pleased to start rebuilding their friendship. The rest of our heroes are making plans, too. Ash wants to go home for a fresh start. Alain returns to work for Professor Sycamore. And Serena remembers ...

episodes.title: The Last Battle with Satoshi! Serena's Choice!!
episodes.plot: Lumiose City is nearly back to normal, and Serena has an idea for a celebration. With Professor Sycamore's help, she and Shauna put on a special performance for everyone! They're soon joined by their Master Class rival Jessilee, and the show is a huge success!Serena wants to keep pursuing her performance goals, but she's not sure about her next step. With the support of Ash and her mom, she finally decides to turn down Palermo's offer so she can keep improving on her own. But Palermo has a surprising response: she suggests that Serena travel to the Hoenn region to try...

episodes.title: Farewell, Satoshi Gekkouga! Xerosicy's Counterattack!!
episodes.plot: After dropping Goodra back home, the group head back to Lumiose City so Ash can return home only to be attacks by roots and Xerosic captures Clemont.

episodes.title: The Endless Zero! Until the Day We Meet Again!!
episodes.plot: Leaving the Kalos region, Satoshi says goodbye to his friends. Also leaving is Serena, who is going to Houen to enter their Pokemon contests. Saying goodbye to Eureka and Citron, they all depart, but they may meet again someday...

episodes.title: The Legend of XYZ!
episodes.plot: Visiting recently discovered ruins, Professor Sycamore meets up with Alexa as they discuss the history behind the ruins and the stone maiden that they find here.

episodes.title: Pathways to Performance Partnering!
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Dance, Yancham - Captivate, Fokko! The Dance for Tomorrow!!
episodes.plot: After a squabble between friends, a chance meeting gives our heroes a chance for some unexpected teamwork.

episodes.title: When Light and Dark Collide!
episodes.plot: When Satoshi and Pikachu attempt to rescue a Bull from a sinister Luchabull, they accidentally injure the Erureido who's swooping in to protect it--and then discover that they've interrupted a rehearsal of a Super Pokemon Battle show. The director, Carl, explains that the show combines a Pokemon battle with a scripted storyline--but since one of his stars is injured, he'll have to call off tomorrow's performance. Eureka has a better idea: she suggests that Satoshi's Hawlucha step in to fill the role of the shining hero. Luchabull has some trouble with the idea of a ...

episodes.title: Ninja Arts Showdown! Gekogashira VS Gamenodes!!
episodes.plot: Ash and his friends meet with Sanpei again and his newly evolved Greninja. They decide to help him transport his scroll to his master located on top of a mountain, only for a mysterious ninja and his Barbaracle to be in their way.

episodes.title: Serena's Earnest! The Wild Meecle Race!!
episodes.plot: A visit to a Skiddo ranch provides our heroes with some unexpected challenges.

episodes.title: Calamanero VS Maaiika! The Bonds that Would Save the World!!
episodes.plot: Ash and friends battle the evil Malamar again.

episodes.title: The Weakest Dragon!? Numera Appears!
episodes.plot: As our heroes make their way up a rocky hill, an unconscious Goomy falls out of the sky, right onto Ash's head! Clemont figures out that Goomy isn't feeling well because it's dehydrated, and Ash braves a steep climb to get it to the nearby river. But as soon as it's restored to health, Team Rocket swoops in to grab Pikachu, and Goomy ends up in their cage as well! While Jessie, James, and Meowth are celebrating their latest catch, the two Pokemon are working together, combining Pikachu's strength and Goomy's slime to escape the cage and flee. When they reunite with ...

episodes.title: Do Your Best, Dedenne! Do it for Numera!!
episodes.plot: When our heroes take a break on the way to Coumarine City, Team Rocket attacks! Everyone is separated in the chaos, leaving Meowth stranded with Serena and Bonnie (and Ash's Goomy). While pretending to help, Meowth leads the group straight to Jessie and James! Serena and Pancham step up to take them on, and with the help of Bonnie and Dedenne, they're victorious! But during the battle, Goomy gets frightened and goes off to hide. Dedenne follows Goomy's slimy trail through a rocky tunnel--and discovers the little Dragon type facing off against Team Rocket on the other ...

episodes.title: Vanipeti Panic! An Ice-Covered Whiteout!!
episodes.plot: When our heroes arrive in Coumarine City, they learn that Nurse Joy is taking care of a lost Vanillite and head off to meet it! They take a shortcut through a ranch where the owner, Ramos, watches over a large number of Grass-type Pokemon. At the Pokemon Center, Bonnie happily plays with the friendly Vanillite--until Team Rocket shows up to steal it! It turns out Vanillite has powerful friends, and when Vanillish and Vanilluxe come looking for their lost companion, they bury the entire city under a massive snowstorm! Ramos directs the huge group of Sunflora under his ...

episodes.title: Hiyoku Gym Battle! Gekogashira VS Gogoat!!
episodes.plot: It's time for Ash's Coumarine City Gym battle with Ramos, and our hero can't wait to get started! But Ramos is in no hurry. He invites our heroes to tea, and then asks them for some help tending his garden. When the battle begins and Ash's Fletchinder takes down Jumpluff, he thinks he has a big advantage at this Grass-type Gym! But Ramos's Weepinbell unleashes a Poison Powder that quickly defeats Fletchinder and then Hawlucha. Finally, Ash sends out the Water-type Frogadier, which seems like a bad type matchup. But it turns out Ash has a plan--he instructs Frogadier ...

episodes.title: Satoshi and Serena's First Date!? The Tree of Promises and the Presents!!
episodes.plot: A Coumarine City tradition is in jeopardy, and our heroes are faced with averting a major crisis.

episodes.title: Aim to be the Kalos Queen! Serena Makes Her Debut!
episodes.plot: It's Serena's Pokémon Showcase debut, surrounded by friends and rivals, old and new.

episodes.title: Decisive Battle in the Badlands! Fight, Numera!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Goomy are in the middle of some special training in the Lumiose Badlands when an injured Spoink appears and leads Ash and the others to its oasis home. There, our heroes find a group of Spoink under the control of an unpleasant Grumpig, who's using its psychic powers to control them and steal all their food! When our heroes retreat to plan their strategy, they find themselves in a cage set by Team Rocket! It turns out Grumpig is in cahoots with the villains to seize the oasis and its impressive food supply from the resident Spoink. Goomy slips through the bars...

episodes.title: Protect the Future of Science! The Electric Labyrinth!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes make their way through the Lumiose Badlands, Clemont remembers his promise to battle Ash at the Lumiose Gym for Ash's fifth Gym badge. But Clemont now has doubts about his own readiness to take the challenge... When they reach the Kalos Power Plant, our heroes discover it has been seized by Team Rocket! They've also taken control of all the Electric-type Pokemon in the area, including Pikachu, Dedenne, and Luxio, and they're threatening to shut down power to Lumiose City. It's an uphill battle, but our heroes demonstrate exceptional bravery in rescuing ...

episodes.title: A Fork in the Path of Indecision!? Musashi and Sonans!
episodes.plot: A conflict of heartfelt emotions threatens the future of a longstanding partnership.

episodes.title: Fokko VS Mahoxy! A Splendid Performance Battle!!
episodes.plot: A chance meeting with a mysterious Pokémon Performer provides Serena and her Pokémon with some priceless advice and support.

episodes.title: Kameil and Raichu Appear! Good Luck Numeil!!
episodes.plot: A surprise reunion with an old friend gives Ash the perfect opportunity for training--and even more surprises.

episodes.title: The Miare City Investigation! Citroid VS Black Citroid!!
episodes.plot: Ash, Serena, and Bonnie have finally rejoined Clemont in Lumiose City! Ash can't wait to get their Gym battle started, but it's quickly interrupted by Officer Jenny...who places Clembot under arrest! Security footage shows a robot that looks just like Clembot vandalizing several businesses around the city. Clemont sets out to prove Clembot's innocence with the help of the journalist Alexa, who's been trying to track down the mysterious man in the Blaziken mask as a possible witness. At Alexa's advice, Clemont investigates the Prism Tower computer where Clembot's ...

episodes.title: Miare Gym Battle! Satoshi VS Citron!!
episodes.plot: After a false start, the Lumiose Gym battle between Ash and Clemont is getting under way! To begin, Clemont's Bunnelby and Ash's Pikachu trade the same moves they used when they first met, on Ash's first day in the Kalos region. Bunnelby has learned some new tricks since then, but it can't stand up against Pikachu's Iron Tail. Next up, Clemont sends out Heliolisk, and Ash switches to Goodra. But Heliolisk moves with impressive speed, dashing around the battlefield more quickly than Goodra can follow and leaving it paralyzed. Ash calls Goodra back and sends out the ...

episodes.title: The Coveted Mega Evolution! Gaburias's Bonds!!
episodes.plot: On their way out of Lumiose City, our heroes visit Professor Sycamore, who enthusiastically shows them his latest experiment: he's acquired a Key Stone and a Mega Stone, and he wants to see if his friend Garchomp will Mega Evolve! But while everyone's excitement builds, there is a huge explosion and Garchomp is whisked away, along with both stones. The thieves? None other than Team Rocket! Professor Sycamore and our heroes chase after them, soon joined by the mysterious man in the Blaziken Mask! When Team Rocket tries to get Garchomp to Mega Evolve and join them, ...

episodes.title: Battle in the Wetlands! Numelgon VS Florges!
episodes.plot: Our heroes are on their way to Laverre City when a passerby recognizes Ash's Goodra. He introduces himself as Keanan and explains that he's the caretaker of the nearby wetlands where Goodra used to live when it was a Goomy. Ash and the others are excited to visit Goodra's old home, but the Pokemon seems reluctant... When they reach the wetlands, Keanan explains that some time ago, a feud broke out over a healing spring in the area. In the battle, Goomy was launched into the air, where it was carried along by a flock of Swanna until it eventually fell on Ash's head! ...

episodes.title: Hoopa's Surprise Ring Adventures
episodes.plot: Six various shorts featuring Ash, Pikachu and Hoopa released in connection with Pokémon 18th movie (Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages).

episodes.title: Conclusion! Numelgon, Somewhere Over the Rainbow!!
episodes.plot: With Goodra's beloved wetlands in imminent danger, our heroes are faced with a must-win situation for the sake of the many Pokémon who live there.

episodes.title: The Worst Luck? Eureka VS Nyarth!!
episodes.plot: On the way to Laverre City, Serena and Bonnie look up their daily fortunes in Serena's guidebook, which predicts a bad day for both of them. Meanwhile, the Team Rocket trio, who have just gotten their hands on a berry bonanza, spot our heroes and swoop down to attack! In the ensuing battle, some of the berries end up in our heroes' hands. Then, when three angry Pangoro charge out of the woods, everyone runs for cover and gets separated, and Bonnie ends up with Meowth! The two of them bicker at first but eventually decide to cooperate. After Bonnie gets hit with Spore ...

episodes.title: The Scary House's Hospitality!
episodes.plot: The gang finds themselves lost in the forest and happen upon a creepy house. They are invited in by its host Lon and despite his warm welcome, something else is lurking in the house and intends to give them the scare of their lives.

episodes.title: Battle at the Fashion Show! Tatsubay VS Shushupu!
episodes.plot: When our heroes arrive in Laverre City, Serena tells Ash that Gym Leader Valerie is also a renowned fashion designer--which, unfortunately for Ash and another would-be challenger named Sawyer, means the Gym is closed for a fashion show and there are no battles to be found! Ash and Sawyer decide to have a battle of their own while Serena and Bonnie admire Valerie's lovely designs...and then get recruited to join the fashion show as substitute models! Our heroes soon learn that at the end of every fashion show, Valerie chooses a challenger from the audience so she can ...

episodes.title: Kunoe Gym Battle! The Beautiful Fairy Trap!!
episodes.plot: After observing the talents and skills of Laverre Gym Leader Valerie in action, it's time for Ash to challenge her for his sixth Kalos Gym badge! First, Valerie's Sylveon is up against Ash's Fletchinder. Ash gets the first win-as Sawyer takes notes. Valerie next sends out Spritzee, who gains the speed advantage by using Trick Room and knocks Fletchinder out. The score is now one to one! Ash sends in Hawlucha. Ash is victorious Sawyer really wants Ash to teach him how to battle with the same unique brand of creativity and power. Ash promises to battle Sawyer later by ...

episodes.title: Three-Match Rival Battle! Towards the Future!!
episodes.plot: After Ash's victory at the Laverre Gym, our heroes are walking with Sawyer, who's completely focused on his battle notebook and not watching where he's going--until he trips and falls, dropping his notebook in the process! He doesn't realize this until later, and by that time, Team Rocket has picked it up, determined to make use of all the information within. With the help of his Slurpuff's talented nose, Sawyer manages to track down his prized possession, and he and Ash battle together to send Team Rocket blasting off again. Then, they decide to battle against each ...

episodes.title: The Wind, the Egg and Onbat!
episodes.plot: When Ash's Hawlucha finds a Pokémon Egg, everyone teams up to keep it warm, including a very helpful Fletchinder! Soon, a cute little Noibat hatches from the Egg! It starts trying to fly at once, but isn't very successful. Hawlucha tries to show it how to ride the wind--until Team Rocket swoops in and grabs both of them! Jessie and Meowth are hoping to evolve Noibat on the spot into a powerful Noivern, but James does some research and learns it won't be that easy. During their discussion, the two Pokémon manage to escape into a pitch-black cave, where they quickly get...

episodes.title: Pikachu Becomes a Star!? Its Movie Debut!! / How to Pikachu The Movie! OK! Action!! / The Lightning-fast Hero! Super Pikachu!! / Pikachu's Shocking Bloopers
episodes.plot: During aerial training with Noibat, our heroes spot three Pokémon flying overhead at impressive speed. It turns out they're headed to the Pokémon Sky Relay, an aerial race in which three-member teams of flying Pokémon compete against each other. An elderly gentleman named Ornithol offers his Sky Relay expertise, and Ash just happens to have three flying Pokémon, so they agree to work together! Fletchinder takes an early lead. Then, in the second leg, Hawlucha encounters an aggressive Pelipper that keeps trying to knock it out of the sky...and turns out to be a robot ...

episodes.title: Fierce Battle in the Monster Ball Factory! Pikachu VS Nyarth!!
episodes.plot: A tour of the Poké Ball Factory provides our heroes with much more than just Poké Balls!

episodes.title: Tairenar and Yancham!! A Captivating Fiery Performance!!
episodes.plot: Serena's next Pokémon Showcase appearance is taking place in Dendemille Town, and she's faced with some stiff competition.

episodes.title: Rotom's Wish!
episodes.plot: At a run-down hotel, a timid desk clerk named Yolton shows our heroes to their room. Satoshi wants to check out the hotel's public battlefield, where they discover Mantle, the owner, challenging other Trainers to battle and taking their Pokémon when they lose. Yolton's Rotom comes out of hiding to reveal that its Trainer was once the owner, but Mantle challenged him to a battle on the hotel's opening day 10 years ago. When the inexperienced Rotom ran away, Mantle declared himself the winner--of the battle and the hotel. To make amends, Rotom sends our heroes back in ...

episodes.title: The Pumpjin Festival! Farewell, Bakeccha!?
episodes.plot: Ash, Serena, Clemont, and Bonnie find themselves attending a Gourgeist Festival, where everyone dresses in Pokémon costumes. Naturally, our heroes want to join the fun! Meanwhile, Team Rocket, also in costume, gets an invitation to the castle from Count Pumpka. His Prince Pumpkaboo has developed quite an interest in Jessie's Pumpkaboo. Jessie seizes the opportunity and tells the count that some terrible villains have stolen her Pikachu--namely, our heroes! She suggests that she might trade her Pumpkaboo to the count if he helps rescue Pikachu. The count's steward ...

episodes.title: Crossing the Snow Mountains! Mammoo and Yukinooh!
episodes.plot: A giant snowy mountain stands between our heroes and their next destination. To cross it, they rent two powerful Mamoswine and climb on board! It's a treacherous trek up to the summit, but everything proceeds as planned until the Mamoswine make an unexpected turn toward the Frost Cavern, where a mighty Abomasnow blocks the way! Ash and the others discover that Abomasnow is standing guard over a sick little Snover, and Clemont soon has everyone searching for medicinal plants. With these ingredients, he prepares a remedy, and Snover is soon feeling just fine. After a ...

episodes.title: Harimaron! Its First Errand!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes have stopped at a busy Pokémon Center to get out of the rain when the power goes out! Clemont soon discovers that a leak in the roof has caused a short circuit, and recruits Luxray, Pikachu, and Dedenne to serve as a temporary source of electricity while he fixes it. Ash climbs up to repair the leak, and Serena and Bonnie offer to help Nurse Joy take care of the Pokémon. Clemont needs a replacement fuse, but he can't leave the still-sparking fuse box unattended, and everyone else is still hard at work. So he sends Chespin and Bunnelby into town with a note ...

episodes.title: A Broken Twig and a Broken Heart! Tairenar's Strong Feelings!!
episodes.plot: A crisis in confidence leads to renewed strength and determination.

episodes.title: Photo Op on Fire! Snap the Legend!!
episodes.plot: When our heroes arrive at the foot of Mt. Molteau, the sudden appearance of a fiery Charmeleon lets them know that Trevor, their friend from Pokémon summer camp, is nearby! His goal is to take a photograph of the Legendary Pokémon Moltres, who is reputed to live on Mt. Molteau. The Team Rocket villains are close behind, hoping to catch Moltres for the Boss--but when they grab Pikachu and a battle ensues near the volcano's crater, the Legendary Pokémon awakens and sends Team Rocket blasting off with a powerful Flamethrower! Unfortunately, it thinks our heroes are also ...

episodes.title: Eureka the Caretaker! The Spoiled Chigoras!!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket has gotten their hands on a young Tyrunt, with plans to get it to evolve into a powerful Tyrantrum. But Tyrunt wants nothing to do with them, jumping out of their balloon and falling into a river! Bonnie finds Tyrunt there, trapped and yelping. After Bonnie frees Tyrunt, the two of them begin an endearing process of bonding, while the rest of our heroes watch in amazement. But Clemont can't quite understand what a Tyrunt would be doing out there in the wild... However, Team Rocket is determined as ever, and grabs Tyrunt, Bunnelby, Dedenne, and Bonnie! But ...

episodes.title: Memories of the Train! Citron and Horubee!!
episodes.plot: On the road to Anistar City, Ash and friends fall into a Team Rocket pit trap! Pikachu quickly sends the villains blasting off again, but then the ground underneath our heroes collapses, leaving them in an abandoned subway tunnel. It reminds Bonnie of when she and Clemont first met Bunnelby, who was living in an old subway car in Lumiose City with a group of Pokémon. The group was being threatened by a grumpy Diggersby who wanted the train for itself! Thanks to some battling tips from Clemont, Bunnelby managed to defeat Diggersby and protect its home. Soon, the subway...

episodes.title: The Eievui Who is Shy of Strangers!? Capture at the Flower Garden!!
episodes.plot: A beautiful meadow provides our heroes with the perfect spot to take a break and witness a surprising performance.

episodes.title: Tag Team Inspiration!
episodes.plot: In Anistar City, where Serena is rehearsing for the next Pokémon Showcase, our heroes get a nice surprise when their friends Tierno and Shauna arrive with newly evolved Pokémon! But Serena's new friend Eevee is skittish and shy in the presence of so many others, and she suggests a Tag Battle so Eevee can gain some experience and confidence. It's Ash and Tierno versus Serena and Shauna! When Tierno and his Blastoise go into their usual battle dance, Eevee starts toe-tapping right along with them, and soon it's leaping and whirling faster than Blastoise can follow! It ...

episodes.title: A Performance Pop Quiz!
episodes.plot: It's time for the Anistar City Pokémon Showcase, and a second Princess Key hangs in the balance for Serena.

episodes.title: The Crisis in Kalos! The Battle of the Giant Sundial!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes look to Ash's next battle at the Anistar City Gym, they discover things about its Gym Leader they never could have imagined.

episodes.title: The Double Battle in the Hyakkoku Gym! Gojika's Future Sight!!
episodes.plot: The Double Battle between Ash and Olympia, the Anistar Gym Leader, is just beginning! Olympia's powerful team of Meowstic, with their combination of Helping Hand (a support move) and Future Sight (a delayed attack), seems unbeatable. But once Ash recognizes Olympia's strategy, things begin to turn around! He asks Pikachu to measure the timing of the Future Sight delay, and with that information, directs his Talonflame and Frogadier to send the Meowstic right into the path of their own attack! Ash claims the victory, and with it, the Psychic Badge! Our heroes then set ...

episodes.title: We've Arrived in the Kalos Region! Dreams and Adventures Begin!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Pikachu finally make it to the Kalos Region where they meet Clemont and his little sister Bonnie.

episodes.title: Mega Evolution and the Prism Tower!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket's new device causes a Garchomp to go on a wild rampage around the city.

episodes.title: Keromatsu VS Yayakoma! Aerial Battle Maneuvers!!
episodes.plot: Ash registers for the Kalos League with Froakie. While Ash looks for new Pokémon, a battle ensues when a wild Fletching steals food from a Dedenne.

episodes.title: Pikachu and Dedenne! Cheek Rub!!
episodes.plot: At Dr. Platane's research lab, Serena has to choose between Harimaron, Fokko, and Keromatsu for her first Pokémon. After learning about the three with her new Pokédex, she tells the professor she made her choice even before she got there. It's Fokko. Meanwhile, our heroes are on their way to Hakudan City for Satoshi's first Gym battle, and Eureka is demonstrating just how much she loves to take care of Pokémon. She gives Pikachu a bath, then helps Yayakoma clean its wings. The two Pokémon are happily settling in for some snacks when the Dedenne our heroes encountered ...

episodes.title: The Hakudan Gym Battle! The Magnificent Viviyon's Dance Battle!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes have finally arrived in Santalune City, and Ash can't wait to get on with his first Kalos region Gym battle!
