Clemont and Bonnie aren't sure of the Gym's location, but a photographer offers them directions. Thanks to her, they quickly find the Santalune Gym, where they run into Alexa and Helioptile! Alexa figured they would be there to challenge her Gym Leader sister soon, so she waited for them. The Gym Leader herself arrives: it's Viola, the photographer they met earlier! After a tour of the Gym, which contains a gallery of some of Viola's excellent ...

episodes.title: Decisive Battle on the Ice! Pikachu VS Viviyon!!
episodes.plot: After his defeat at the Hakudan City Gym, Satoshi is having doubts that he can defeat Gym Leader Viola in a rematch. But Serena reminds him that he's always been determined not to give up until it's over. This snaps Satoshi out of his self-doubt and inspires him to do some serious training with Pikachu and Yayakoma against Pansy's Onvern. Standing up to Onvern's Gust is hard work, but soon Satoshi feels like they're ready. He also has an idea about how to deal with the ice battlefield if Viola uses that trick again, but he's not telling. Since they also had trouble ...

episodes.title: Leave It to Serena!? The Exciting Sihorn Race!
episodes.plot: There's an opportunity to be part of an exciting Rhyhorn race, and Ash can't wait to give it a try.

episodes.title: Pokémon Trimmer and Trimmien!
episodes.plot: Our heroes arrive in a town where they spot a beautifully styled Pokémon called a Trimmien. Suddenly, another Trimmien comes bounding out from a bush and knocks Eureka down, but this Trimmien is very unstylish. We then meet its Trainer--a young girl named , who informs them that her Trimmien won't let her style it or even brush it, because it hasn't yet recognized Jessica as its partner. Wanting to make up for accidently knocking Eureka down, Jessica invites our heroes to the shop of celebrated Pokémon groomer Barry, where she works. Everyone is amazed at the shop and...

episodes.title: Subdue Miare Gym! Citron's Secret!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes arrive in Miare City, Satoshi and Serena look around in awe, while Citron and Eureka seem a little nervous. The impressive Prism Tower catches Serena's eye, and Satoshi tells her about his attempt to challenge the Miare Gym inside it--an attempt that was shut down by a robot who threw him out because he didn't have four Kalos Gym badges. Citron and Eureka try to get them moving when someone pulls up beside them--it's Limone, Citron and Eureka's father. Limone reveals that Citron is the Miare City Gym Leader. Citron explains that the Gym was taking up too...

episodes.title: Harimaron VS Mega-Mega Nyarth!!
episodes.plot: As long as our heroes are in Miare City, Serena suggests they visit Dr. Platane before they continue their journey--and she's made a batch of delicious macarons for the occasion. At the doctor's lab, they settle in with a nice cup of tea, only to discover the macarons are missing. They find the basket of treats in a corner, guarded by a very hungry Harimaron who isn't interested in sharing. Meanwhile, the Rocket-Dan has been researching Dr. Platane's studies on Mega Evolution, and the villains decide stealing his data would be a big boost to their schemes. They break ...

episodes.title: Pursuit in the Bamboo Forest! Yancham and Goronda!!
episodes.plot: During a lunch break on their way to Shoyo City, our heroes are being spied on. Yes, the Rocket-Dan is lurking, but so are two adorable Yancham. Serena offers them some Pokémon food, but they're not satisfied until they gobble up all of it--and our heroes' lunch, as well. There's no time to react, because the Rocket-Dan takes advantage of the confusion to net Pikachu, Harimaron, Fokko, and Keromatsu and speed away. Musashi, Kojiro, and Nyarth have grand visions of how the Boss will reward them for this impressive haul, but they quickly get into a fight about who ...

episodes.title: Capture the Pokémon Buyer! The Kofuurai Impersonation Plan!!
episodes.plot: On the road to Shoyo City, our heroes are forced to leap out of the way when a truck barrels down on them, with Officer Junsa in close pursuit. When the dust clears, Satoshi and friends spot a cage that fell off the truck, and a weary Kofukimushi that crawls out and collapses. They scoop it up and take it to the nearest Pokémon Center, where Officer Junsa finds them--and tries to arrest Satoshi for being an accomplice in stealing the Kofukimushi. The misunderstanding is quickly sorted out. Officer Junsa explains that she's on the trail of Daz, a Pokémon smuggler who ...

episodes.title: Nymphia VS Keromatsu! Big Commotion in the Kindergarten!!
episodes.plot: As Satoshi, Serena, Citron, and Eureka continue their journey, they meet a young woman named Premier who challenges Satoshi to a battle right there in the forest. Premier wants Satoshi to come with her if she beats him, which makes Serena a little nervous...and her partner for the battle is Nymphia, a Pokémon Satoshi hasn't seen before. Satosih is extra excited when Citron tells him Nymphia is a Fairy-type Pokémon. Keromatsu does its best, but Nymphia easily defeats it with a devastating combo of Attract and Draining Kiss, leaving Keromatsu embarrassed and sulky. ...

episodes.title: The Mysterious Rain Shelter! Nyasper Is Watching!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes and the Rocket-Dan all seek shelter from a downpour in an old, abandoned mansion. When lights come on and doors close behind them, they're convinced the mansion is haunted. Our heroes encounter a mysterious being with glowing eyes, and Satoshi, Serena, and Citron are terrified--but Eureka runs after it and ends up making a new friend: a Psychic-type Pokémon named Nyasper. Nyasper has been responsible for all the strange happenings in the house, and it's keeping them from leaving for some reason. Nyasper shows her the pendant it's wearing, and points out the...

episodes.title: Harimaron VS Mafoxy! A Diet Battle!?
episodes.plot: On their way to Shoyo City, our heroes camp out for the night. Citron makes dinner, and for dessert, Serena brings out a basket full of her homemade macarons. But the basket is empty, and Citron discovers that his Harimaron has eaten them all...again. Citron tries to get Harimaron to battle Satoshi's Keromatsu for some exercise. But Harimaron is completely stuffed and moving slowly, and Keromatsu beats it easily. Eureka challenges them next, and Dedenne wins in a flash. Citron is determined to get his Pokémon ready for battle again. The next morning, Harimaron wakes ...

episodes.title: Dedenne Is Pichu, Pichu Is Dedenne...!?
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their journey to the Shoyo City Gym, they stop at a Pokémon Center, where Nurse Joi declares all their Pokémon are in perfect health. A Trainer named Rena and her young sister Rimu are there as well. When our heroes prepare to leave, Eureka accidentally grabs the wrong bag, but doesn't realize it until later, when she looks inside. Dedenne is gone, and in its place? A Pichu. Realizing Eureka grabbed the wrong bag, our heroes go back to the Pokémon Center and Nurse Joi recalls the "little girl with the red ribbon in her hair", so off they go in ...

episodes.title: Keromatsu VS Gekogashira! Ninja Battle!!
episodes.plot: During our heroes' journey to Shoyo City, Satoshi and Keromatsu meet a young ninja named Sanpei and his Gekogashira. Satoshi challenges them to a battle, and Gekogashira defeats Keromatsu with an impressive Quick Attack. Sanpei is about to take his leave when Satoshi asks him for some special training--he's never seen anything like Gekogashira's Quick Attack, and wants Sanpei to teach Keromatsu how it's done. Sanpei agrees, and Keromatsu enters ninja training--and thanks to Serena's costume skills, Eureka, Dedenne, and Pikachu get to play ninja too. After Sanpei takes...

episodes.title: Wake Up Kabigon! Battle in Parfum Palace!
episodes.plot: On their way to Shoyo City, our heroes make a stop in Koboku Town, where they encounter a Kabigon sleeping in the middle of town, snoring so loudly that the noise is unbearable. Every year at the end of the harvest, Kabigon comes to clear out the roots from the town's crops. Kabigon gets to eat its fill of tasty roots, and the townspeople get their fields plowed in the process. Afterward, they throw a Harvest Festival, and the Lord of Shobonne Castle plays the Pokémon Flute--the only thing that can wake Kabigon up after a big meal. But this year he's refusing to ...

episodes.title: Madame X's Plot! The Scary Calamanero!!
episodes.plot: As the Rocket-Dan is plotting yet again to steal Pikachu, they are interrupted by two mysterious figures: a hooded woman known only as Madame X, and Calamanero, a Pokémon with incredible hypnotic powers. Musashi and Kojiro fall under its spell, but Nyarth manages to escape--and runs right into our heroes. Satoshi, Serena, Citron, and Eureka help get the injured Nyarth back on his feet, and he warns them that Madame X and Calamanero are coming for Pikachu. And that's just what happens, as the two show up along with the mind-controlled Musashi and Kojiro, swoop Pikachu ...

episodes.title: Battle Chateau Challenge! Viola VS Zakuro!!
episodes.plot: On their way to Shoyo City, our heroes meet Nikola and Tesla, two brothers who introduce them to the incredible Battle Chateau. Its owner, Lord Ikkon, explains that the Trainers who battle there are considered knights and expected to adhere to the knight's code of chivalry and honor. By defeating others at the Battle Chateau, a Trainer receives a title of nobility--from the lowly Baron to the acclaimed Grand Duke. Nikola has already earned his Baron title, and he wants to introduce Tesla to the Chateau. First, though, he's looking for a battle of his own--and when his...

episodes.title: A PokéVision of Things to Come!
episodes.plot: After watching a popular celebrity making a "PokéVision" video with her Pokémon, Serena tries to make one with her Fennekin.

episodes.title: Fish Up the Golden Koiking!!
episodes.plot: A visit by our heroes to an amazing aquarium turns out to reveal the stuff of legends.

episodes.title: The Bond of the Aurora! Amarus and Amaruruga!!
episodes.plot: In Kojin Town, our heroes run into the journalist Pansy, who's working on an article about an amazing discovery at the Fossil Lab. She invites Satoshi, Serena, Citron, and Eureka to come with her, and they all check out the lab's collection of fossils from Pokémon that lived long ago and are now extinct. The fossils aren't the amazing discovery, though--the researchers take our heroes into a special frozen habitat inside the lab, where they meet a living Amarus and Amaruruga that were restored from fossils discovered in the ice. After they leave, the Rocket-Dan swoops...

episodes.title: An Undersea Place to Call Home!
episodes.plot: Before Ash's Cyllage City Gym battle, a visit to the Muraille Coast set our heroes on an aquatic adventure filled with undersea Pokémon.

episodes.title: Shoyo Gym Battle! Pikachu VS Chigoras!!
episodes.plot: Satoshi and friends have finally made it to Shoyo City, where they head straight for the Gym so Satoshi can challenge Zakuro for his second badge. But first, Zakuro has a challenge for Satoshi: scaling a tall rock wall to reach the battlefield at the top. Serena, Citron, and Eureka take the elevator up, but Satoshi decides to meet the challenge and make the climb. Impressed, Zakuro brings out his Iwark, and Satoshi counters with Keromatsu. It quickly becomes apparent that the special training has paid off, because Keromatsu manages to escape from Iwark's frightening ...

episodes.title: Peroppafu and Peroream!! The Sweet Battle isn't a Piece of Cake!?
episodes.plot: Serena shows off her baking skills with a batch of Poké Puffs, sweet treats made especially for Pokémon! After a Slurpuff swipes them, she quickly develops a rivalry with its Trainer, Miette, who thinks her Poké Puffs are superior...and who seems to have a little thing for Ash. Serena and Miette enter a baking contest to settle the score, and they both make it into the final round--but when they go out in search of berries to use in their next batch, they find that the local shops and the surrounding forest have been picked clean! Our heroes quickly discover that Team...

episodes.title: Flabebe and the Fairy Flower!
episodes.plot: When a tiny and sad-looking Pokémon lands in Eureka's hair, our heroes are determined to find out what's wrong. Its Trainer, Grey, explains that the little Flabébé has a special bond with his wife, Hannah. She recently became ill, and when Flabébé tried to visit her in the hospital, a passing car blew its flower away. Without its flower, Flabébé is growing weak, but it won't accept just any flower as a replacement--it needs a Fairy Flower, and those are hard to find. Our heroes set out in search of the flower, "assisted" by the Rocket-Dan in tour-guide disguises. ...

episodes.title: Champion Carnet Appears! Mega Sirnight in the Mist!!
episodes.plot: A chance encounter with the Champion gives our heroes a deeper look into the mysteries of Evolution.

episodes.title: Ta-da! Fake Satoshi Appears!!
episodes.plot: Following yet another unsuccessful attempt to grab Pikachu, the Rocket-Dan comes up with a new plan: dress up like Satoshi, Serena, and Eureka, and run around town, wreaking havoc everywhere. When our heroes arrive in town, they learn of the strange goings-on and promise Officer Junsa they will stay out of trouble while she investigates. Meanwhile, Musashi and Kojiro, now disguised as scientists, have lured Citron away from the others and coaxed him into helping them with a couple of their robots. The next day, using the robots, they grab Pikachu and make their ...

episodes.title: Corni and Lucario! The Secret of Mega Evolution!!
episodes.plot: Continuing their journey to Shalour City, our heroes are approached by an energetic Trainer named Korrina. She challenges Ash to a battle, hoping to extend her winning streak to 99 in a row-and succeeds! Korrina introduces herself as the Shalour City Gym Leader and explains that she vowed to win 100 battles in a row before heading to Geosenge Town to find the Mega Stone that will allow her Lucario to Mega Evolve. The Team Rocket trio manage to get their hands on Lucario and Pikachu and make their escape. But thanks to the bond between Korrina and Lucario, she can ...

episodes.title: Lucario VS Bursyamo! The Cave of Trials!!
episodes.plot: Along with Shara Gym Leader Corni, our heroes have arrived in Sekitai Town to search for the Lucarionite, the Mega Stone needed for Lucario's Mega Evolution. A photographer points them to a cave deep within the mountains, but warns them it might be dangerous. Sure enough, when they get to the cave, the Rocket-Dan trio come flying out, propelled by some unseen force. But Corni is determined, and our heroes follow her into the cave. Inside, they do find the Lucarionite - and it's guarded by a powerful Bursyamo, which challenges Corni and Lucario to a battle. It's a bad ...

episodes.title: Mega Lucario VS Mega Lucario! The Wave-Guiding Storm!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes watch in amazement, Corni's Lucario finally Mega Evolves. Satoshi challenges Mega Lucario to a battle on the spot, and Corni excitedly agrees. But something seems to be wrong with Lucario--it completely loses control of itself, ignoring its Trainer's commands and flying into a rage. It's about to unleash a savage attack on an exhausted Pikachu when Concombre sends out his own Lucario to stand in the way. At the Pokémon Center, Concombre expresses concern about Lucario's violent reaction to Mega Evolution, and challenges Corni to a battle against his own ...

episodes.title: Calling from Beyond the Aura!
episodes.plot: On their way to Must Mountain for Corni's special training, our heroes enter a winding cave where they encounter a swarm of agitated Onbat--stirred up by the Rocket-Dan trio in one of their schemes. In the confusion, the friends get separated: Satoshi, Serena, Eureka, and Lucario end up at one entrance to the cave, while Citron, Corni, and Pikachu are at the other. The villains take advantage of the opportunity to strike against Citron's group, and thanks to the "Mecha Evolution" devices attached to the Rocket-Dan Pokémon, they quickly get the upper hand. Meanwhile, ...

episodes.title: Mega Lucario VS Mega Kucheat! The Bonds of Mega Evolution!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes have arrived in Shara City, but the Gym is inside Master Tower, which sits on an island with no apparent way to get there. Corni comes to meet them and advises patience, which gives Satoshi some extra time to train. His Pokémon have really picked up on Tierno's rhythmic battle style, but it seems Satoshi doesn't quite have the dancing skills to pull it off. Low tide reveals the path to the island, and our heroes cross, eager for a Gym battle--but first, Concombre has a history lesson for them. He tells how one of his ancestors discovered Mega Evolution ...

episodes.title: Champion of the Forest! Luchabull Appears!!
episodes.plot: Traversing a forest on their way to Shara City, our heroes happily watch three forest Pokémon help each other gather berries. Suddenly, an angry Ringuma appears, grabbing their berries and scaring them out of their wits! Then, just as suddenly, a brave Luchabull appears and battles the Ringuma, giving the forest Pokémon time to retrieve their berries. But Luchabull strikes an artistic pose right before its last move, which allows Ringuma to escape. Speaking with a forest caretaker named Kanazawa, our heroes learn that Luchabull is the "Forest Champion", protecting ...

episodes.title: A Sky Battle!? Luchabull VS Fiarrow!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes have arrived at the majestic Kalos Canyon, where they witness their first Sky Battle--a battle in midair between two flying Pokémon and their Trainers, who wear wing suits! After a quick lesson, Satoshi is ready to try it himself, and accepts a challenge from Nami and her Fiarrow. Satoshi's Yayakoma wants to battle, but Fiarrow wants a tougher opponent: Luchabull! So Yayakoma is forced to sit out--along with Eureka, who's told she's too small to participate. Luchabull is at a disadvantage, since it can glide but not truly fly. It puts up a good fight, but ...

episodes.title: Reflection Cave! Mirror World Satoshi and Satoshi!?
episodes.plot: While our heroes are exploring Reflection Cave, named for its mirror-like surfaces, Satoshi's own reflection pulls Pikachu through one of the mirrors! Satoshi leaps after it and finds himself in another world, with a Citron, Eureka and Serena very different from the ones he knows. After our Satoshi helps reunite Mirror Satoshi with his own Pikachu, he has to get out of the mirror world right away or risk being stuck there forever! His friends are waiting beside the mirror he first stepped through, and all of them focus on reuniting with each other. Thanks to the ...

episodes.title: Forging Forest Friendships!
episodes.plot: On the way to Shara City, Citron suggests a Double Battle to help Satoshi train for his upcoming Gym challenge. Satoshi's Keromatsu and Luchabull team up against Citron's Pokémon, but their battling styles are so different that they just aren't getting along. Satoshi is trying to teach them how to combine their attacks into a single move he calls Super Flying Cut when he's pulled into the woods by a ghostly forest Pokémon called Ohrot! Luchabill and Keromatsu work together to rescue Satoshi, and after Ohrot lets him go, he finds out why the Pokémon grabbed him in the ...

episodes.title: Pokémon Summer Camp! Enter the Rival Trio!!
episodes.plot: It's day one of Professor Sycamore's Pokémon summer camp, and the excitement and adventures are just getting under way.

episodes.title: Serena VS Sana! Pokévision Showdown!!
episodes.plot: It's day three of Professor Sycamore's Pokémon summer camp, and Pokévision is on everyone's minds.

episodes.title: PokéEnteering! The X in the Mist!
episodes.plot: On day five of Professor Sycamore's Pokémon summer camp, Pokémon Orienteering leads our heroes to a mysterious discovery.

episodes.title: Battling Into the Hall of Fame!
episodes.plot: It's the last day of summer camp, and the Rocket-Dan decides it's time to spring into action. The villains throw off their camp cook disguises and try to steal everyone's Pokémon, only to be sent blasting off again. Then, Team Keromatsu and Team Zenigame face off in the finals of the Team Battle competition, where the three members of each team have to work together and combine their Pokémon's moves. As before, Tierno's rhythmic battling style poses quite a challenge. Team Keromatsu manages to come out on top, but Satoshi is so impressed that he asks Tierno for some ...

episodes.title: Master Tower! The History of Mega Evolution!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes have arrived in Shalour City, but the Gym is inside the Tower of Mastery, which sits on an island with no apparent way to get there. Korrina comes to meet them and advises patience, which gives Ash some extra time to train.

episodes.title: Shara Gym Match! Pikachu VS Mega Lucario!!
episodes.plot: Satoshi's Shara City Gym battle against Corni is under way. As his Luchabull faces off against her Kojofu, he tries to use the rhythmic battle style he learned from Tierno, but it's not going so well. Finally, he remembers Serena's observation that he has his own unique style, and decides to battle like himself instead. With this change of tactics, Luchabull wins, and then Satoshi sends in Hinoyakoma to take down Corni's Goriky. The Gym Leader has just one Pokémon left, and of course it's her partner Lucario, who Mega Evolves and knocks out Hinoyakoma and then ...

episodes.title: Citron VS Eureka!? A Sibling Battle for Nyaonix!!
episodes.plot: En route to Hiyoku City, our heroes meet a Trainer named Ryuji and his Nyaonix, a male with a beautiful blue coat. Among the trees, Harimaron spies a female Nyaonix and runs off in pursuit, followed by Eureka (who is upset at Citron for insisting that she eat her vegetables). When three Spear attack Eureka and Harimaron, Ryuji's older brother Hajime (the female Nyaonix's Trainer) rescues them, and everyone goes off to the brothers' sprawling mansion to get some first aid for Eureka. There, they meet the brothers' parents, and their father declares it's time for a test...

episodes.title: The Clumsy Pukurin VS the Rampaging Bohmander!!
episodes.plot: The Rocket-Dan stalks a Bohmander and attaches a device that's supposed to make it sleep, but something goes wrong and Bohmander runs wild. Meanwhile, our heroes have stopped at a Pokémon Center, where Nurse Joy is overwhelmed by the number of Pokémon arriving for treatment, injured by the very same Bohmander--and her assistant Pukurinn is new to the job and having some trouble. Jessie and James, disguised as ambulance drivers, arrive on the scene to catch Pikachu and Pukurinn. On their way out, they run straight into Bohmander. Nurse Joi steps in to protect her ...

episodes.title: Serena's First Capture!? Yancham VS Fokko!!
episodes.plot: Our heroes meet up with Sana, their friend from summer camp, who takes them to see their first Pokémon Showcase. Elle, the Kalos Queen, starts things off with a fantastic exhibition performance with her Mahoxy--but just as the competition is getting under way, a wild Yancham runs onto the stage and cuts things short with its antics. Satoshi is disappointed, but Sana and Serena are delighted that they got to see Elle perform--and Sana is already making plans to enter the next Pokémon Showcase. Later, the same Yancham steals Satoshi's hat and Citron's glasses and runs ...

episodes.title: Citron's Campus of Memories! An Electrifying Reunion!
episodes.plot: Clemot reunites with his old Pokémon Luxio.

episodes.title: Bonnie for the Defense!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue toward the Coumarine City Gym, Bonnie makes some new friends--and they're a force to be reckoned with.

episodes.title: The Most Magnificent Pokémon in the World!? Chillaccino VS Tsutarja!
episodes.plot: On their way to the site of the upcoming Unova League, our heroes take on an unexpectedly messy battle challenge!

episodes.title: The Tag Battle of the Sky and the Earth!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their trek to Vertress City and the Unova League, they're challenged to a Tag Battle the likes of which they've never experienced!

episodes.title: Iris Returns to the Village of Dragons!
episodes.plot: Iris returns to the dragon village, and reunites with friends and family.

episodes.title: Soryu Gym! Iris VS Shaga!!
episodes.plot: As Iris takes on her battle challenge issued by the Opelucid City Gym Leader Drayden, little does she know what's truly in store!

episodes.title: Team Eievui Moves Out! Pokémon Rescue Team!!
episodes.plot: Traveling to Vertress City and the Unova League, our heroes are introduced to a brave family on a mission of service!

episodes.title: The Isshu League Higaki Conference Gets Underway! Satoshi VS Shooty!!
episodes.plot: The Unova League is off and running, old friends and rivals are reuniting, and the battle action is unrelenting!

episodes.title: Fierce Fighting! Win Out in the Rival Battle!!
episodes.plot: As the battle excitement in Vertress City builds to a fever pitch, the Unova League pairs friends and rivals, old and new!

episodes.title: Kibago Gets Lost!
episodes.plot: While the Unova League prepares to move to the third round, our heroes are faced with a case of lost and found!

episodes.title: Dageki Appears! Satoshi VS Kenyan!!
episodes.plot: As the Unova League makes its way through the third round and barrels toward the quarterfinals, strategy and friendship lead the way!

episodes.title: Satoshi VS Kotetsu! Secret Weapon Sazandora!!
episodes.plot: It's the fourth round of the Unova League, and Cameron's "secret weapon" turns out to be more than anyone thought, including Cameron!

episodes.title: Isshu League Conclusion! Pikachu VS Lucario!!
episodes.plot: As the Unova League roars toward the final match, the competition becomes more fierce, and the strength and skill levels more amazing!

episodes.title: The Araragi Institute! A New Journey!!
episodes.plot: Now that the Unova League is over, our heroes contemplate what the future holds, while a new friend helps them deal with a blast from the past!

episodes.title: A Friend... His Name Is N!
episodes.plot: On a ship heading to meet Professor Cedric Juniper at the White Ruins, our heroes are introduced to a young man with an unusual gift and an equally unusual point of view!

episodes.title: The New Gym Leader - Cheren!
episodes.plot: After arriving in Aspertia City at the request of Professor Juniper, our heroes pay a visit to one of the most unusual Gyms they've ever seen!

episodes.title: Achroma VS Handsome! Plasma-dan's Conspiracy!!
episodes.plot: Continuing their journey to the White Ruins, our heroes encounter a mysterious organization with a sinister plot!

episodes.title: The Foggy Sangi Ranch! Denryu's Light!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their journey to the White Ruins, they come across a Mareep ranch with some fog and leadership issues!

episodes.title: N, Again! Operation Rescue Warrgle!!
episodes.plot: Team Plasma is on the move, and so is N!

episodes.title: The Pokémon Harbor Patrol!
episodes.plot: Arriving in Virbank City, our heroes and N encounter another group of heroes with some surprising results!

episodes.title: Burn, Lizardon! VS Kairyu!
episodes.plot: While visiting a Kanto festival, Ash sees a Charmander, which causes him to recall memories of his Charizard.

episodes.title: Plasma-dan's Ambition! The Controlled Pokémon!!
episodes.plot: Team Plasma is determined to execute its evil plans, but our heroes and N have other ideas!

episodes.title: N's Secret... To the Other Side of the Mist!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their journey to the White Ruins, they learn startling secrets about N and Team Plasma!

episodes.title: Rocket-dan VS Plasma-dan! Nyarth and Achroma!!
episodes.plot: As Team Plasma's mission to control Pokémon continues, Team Rocket's mission takes aim at Team Plasma!

episodes.title: The White Ruins! Satoshi VS N!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes unite with Professor Cedric Juniper at the White Ruins, it soon becomes obvious that they're not the only ones on a quest for information about Reshiram!

episodes.title: Plasma-dan Attacks! Ceremony of Revival!!
episodes.plot: As Team Plasma's plan to steal the Light Stone unfolds, our heroes and their friends are doing everything they can to stop it!

episodes.title: Reshiram VS N! Beyond Truth and Ideals!!
episodes.plot: As the evil plan to control Reshiram continues to unfold, the survival of the world lies in Team Plasma's defeat. But can they be defeated?!

episodes.title: Farewell, Isshu! Setting Sail Once Again!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes prepare to enjoy the next chapter of their exciting adventures, others have different plans!

episodes.title: The Dangerously Sweet Honey!
episodes.plot: As our heroes begin exploring the Decolore Islands, their first stop starts off as a not-so-sweet experience!

episodes.title: Sommelier Detective Dent! The Locked Room of the Ocean!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their Decolore Island-hopping cruise, a shipboard theft calls for some super-Connoisseur sleuthing!

episodes.title: Goodbye Mijumaru!? The Path to Being Hotachi King!
episodes.plot: Arriving on Scalchop Island, our heroes decide to participate in an unusual competition!

episodes.title: Phantom Island! The Zoroark in the Fog!!
episodes.plot: A deserted island gives our heroes the opportunity to witness what enduring friendship is all about!

episodes.title: Rotom VS Dr. Okido!
episodes.plot: Arriving on Torom Island, our heroes meet up with an old friend on an important research mission!

episodes.title: The Pirate Kings of the Decolora Archipelago!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their cruise through the Decolore Islands, a surprise visit by a quartet of unusual pirates changes everyone's course!

episodes.title: Satoshi and Butterfree! Until the Day We Meet Again!!
episodes.plot: Ash and the gang try to help a wild Caterpie evolve into a Butterfree so that it can migrate with the others.

episodes.title: Satoshi and Iris's Severed Relationship!? The Path of Separation!!
episodes.plot: Exploring Capacia Island on their way to the Kanto region, little do our heroes know that the path they're on leads to a place they never imagined!

episodes.title: Wish on Jirachi! The Seven-Day Miracle!!
episodes.plot: Visiting a seemingly lifeless part of Capacia Island, our heroes come upon a life-giving solution to its dilemma!

episodes.title: Shining Flying Saucer! Ohbem's Town!!
episodes.plot: A bright light in the night sky gives our heroes a strange change of pace...and face!

episodes.title: Pansy Appears! Erikiteru and Gogoat!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, they encounter a windfall of delicious berries and unexpected new friends!

episodes.title: Mystery of the Treasure! Deserted Island Adventure!!
episodes.plot: Arriving on a deserted island on a quest for treasure, our heroes find something much more precious than they anticipated!

episodes.title: Ibuki and Iris! The Different Colored Crimgan!!
episodes.plot: When Ash runs into an old friend en route to the Kanto region, Iris discovers a true kindred spirit!

episodes.title: Onvern Appears! Legend of the Comet and the Hero!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, an upcoming celestial event sets the stage for celestial intrigue and delight!

episodes.title: Go, Go Gogoat!
episodes.plot: Visiting a Pokémon Center while touring the Decolore Islands, a surprise detour challenges our heroes to help some new friends in need!

episodes.title: Emonga Joins Rocket-dan!
episodes.plot: A playful island moment turns into a big misunderstanding, and our heroes are about to face a major challenge!

episodes.title: Dent VS the Ice Challenger! The Crisis of Sanyou Gym!!
episodes.plot: Cilan's brothers arrive for a surprise visit, bringing with them the challenge of a lifetime!

episodes.title: Best Wishes! Until the Day We Meet Again!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes near Vermilion City and the end of their shipboard adventures, one familiar challenge forces them to spring into action!

episodes.title: My Dream, Pokémon Master!!
episodes.plot: A visit to Pallet Town to see family and friends shows just how enduring Ash's dreams really are!

episodes.title: Dent and Takeshi! Gyarados's Imperial Rage!!
episodes.plot: Cilan visits Johto on a fishing trip and finds a Gyarados who is behaving oddly. He relays the information to the local Pokémon Center, where Brock is working, and an investigation commences.

episodes.title: The Gym Leader Is a Charisma Model! Kamiture Appears!!
episodes.plot: After meeting the Nimbasa City Gym Leader, Elesa, our heroes encounter an old friend with a surprise guest!

episodes.title: Dazzling the Nimbasa Gym!
episodes.plot: The stakes are high for Ash winning his fourth Unova Gym Badge at the Nimbasa Gym, and our hero's taking no chances!

episodes.title: Lost at the Stamp Rally!
episodes.plot: Spending the day in Nimbasa City after Ash's fourth Unova Gym Badge win, Cilan has a special challenge in mind, while our heroes discover a fellow Trainer in need!

episodes.title: Ash Versus the Champion!
episodes.plot: As our heroes prepare to leave Nimbasa City, they bump into Ash's rival Trip, who introduces them to someone they had only dreamed of meeting!

episodes.title: A Maractus Musical
episodes.plot: On their way to Driftveil City, our heroes meet an enterprising young man with three dedicated friends and a dream!

episodes.title: The Four Seasons of Sawsbuck!
episodes.plot: Stopping at a Pokémon Center on their way to Driftveil City, out heroes meet a young Pokémon photographer on the mission of a lifetime!

episodes.title: Scraggy and the Demanding Gothita!
episodes.plot: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash's next Gym Battle, our heroes meet a demanding Gothita with a crush on Scraggy!

episodes.title: The Lonely Deino!
episodes.plot: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash's next Gym Battle, our heroes come across some very special Pokémon in a very special place!

episodes.title: The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!
episodes.plot: Arriving in Driftveil City, our heroes meet a fascinating hometown resident with a secret!

episodes.title: A Call for Brotherly Love!
episodes.plot: While Ash prepares for his upcoming Gym Battle with Clay, a surprise visitor with a dilemma offers both Ash and Cilan the opportunity to help!

episodes.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends!: Part 1
episodes.plot: What started as a trip to Milos Island to find Revival Herbs has turned into a cataclysmic battle of legendary proportions!

episodes.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends!: Part 2
episodes.plot: In search of scarce Revival Herbs, our heroes are now faced with the potential destruction of Milos Island!

episodes.title: Battling the King of the Mines!
episodes.plot: With a bag full of revival herbs, our heroes have returned to Driftveil City and Ash is raring to battle Gym Leader Clay!

episodes.title: Crisis at Chargestone Cave!
episodes.plot: Continuing their journey to Mistralton City, our heroes encounter Chargestone Cave and a dilemma for its occupants!

episodes.title: Evolution Exchange Excitement!
episodes.plot: After witnessing a dramatic Pokémon trade and evolution, Ash and his friends' excitement has just begun!

episodes.title: Explorers of the Hero's Ruin!
episodes.plot: The elder Professor Juniper has invited our heroes to join him in what he promises will be an exciting adventure...and he keeps his promise!

episodes.title: Battling the Bully!
episodes.plot: An encounter with Pikachu's rival from the past puts our heroes in the middle of a bullying confrontation!

episodes.title: Baffling the Bouffalant!
episodes.plot: An encounter with some very angry Bouffalant forces our heroes to take some unexpected precautions!

episodes.title: Cilan Takes Flight!
episodes.plot: Arriving at the Mistralton City Gym, our heroes are shocked to discover a Gym Leader with a battle style they never would have imagined!

episodes.title: An Amazing Aerial Battle!
episodes.plot: Not only is the Mistralton City Gym Jet Badge on the line, but the Gym Leader's method of battling as well!

episodes.title: Climbing the Tower of Success!
episodes.plot: After reuniting with two old friends, our heroes prepare to participate in a competition that takes making a wish to a higher level!

episodes.title: The Clubsplosion Begins!
episodes.plot: Don George's Clubsplosion Tournament is getting underway, and our heroes obviously have several rivals with scores to settle!

episodes.title: Search for the Clubultimate!
episodes.plot: Round one of the Clubsplosion Tournament rages on, and the explosive action more than lives up to its name!

episodes.title: The Fiercely Fought Donamite! Kirikizan VS Enbuoh!!
episodes.plot: As round one of the Clubsplosion nears completion, round two promises even more excitement with every match!

episodes.title: Commanding the Clubsplosion Crown!
episodes.plot: The Clubsplosion Tournament is all about intense head-to-head battling, but the final round is about to raise the battle bar high!

episodes.title: Rescue Kibago! Aiant's Nest!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue toward Icirrus City, a joyous event precedes a kidnapping crisis!

episodes.title: A Restoration Confrontation!: Part 1
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue their journey to the Icirrus City Gym, they find themselves in Twist Mountain and in the middle of another evil Team Rocket plot!

episodes.title: A Restoration Confrontation! Part 2
episodes.plot: As our heroes battle to save their new Pokémon friends, the survival of an entire world is at stake!

episodes.title: Evolution by Fire!
episodes.plot: Stopping for the night at Don George's Pokémon Battle Club on their way to Icirrus City, our heroes come across a Trainer with a surprising connection to their past!

episodes.title: Guarding the Guardian of the Mountain!
episodes.plot: As our heroes near Icirrus City and Ash's next Gym Battle, they find themselves face to face with the star-studded stuff of legends!

episodes.title: Caution: Icy Battle Conditions!
episodes.plot: The chance for Ash to earn his seventh Unova Gym badge is here, and it's a slippery slope indeed!

episodes.title: Clash of the Connoisseurs!
episodes.plot: While pursuing Ash's eighth Unova Gym badge and subsequent entry into the Unova League, our heroes are summoned to a place where Cilan's Connoisseur skills are in high demand!

episodes.title: Crisis at Ferroseed Research
episodes.plot: On their way to Virbank City, our heroes run into a familiar face and an icy emergency!

episodes.title: An Epic Defense Force!
episodes.plot: Arriving in Virbank City, an old friend gives our heroes a taste of movie making they will never forget!

episodes.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym!: Part 1
episodes.plot: Ash's quest for his eighth Gym badge gets underway-and the battle turns out to be a multimedia event indeed!

episodes.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym!: Part 2
episodes.plot: The Gym is jumping, the fans are cheering, and the quest for Ash's eighth Unova Gym badge is red-hot and rocking!

episodes.title: All for the Love of Meloetta!
episodes.plot: An unexpected encounter with an old friend in Virbank City presents our heroes with unexpected challenges galore!

episodes.title: Pochama VS Yanappu! The Magnificent Battle!!
episodes.plot: With Cynthia's help, our heroes have begun training for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, and a couple of old friends come along for the wild ride!

episodes.title: Expedition to Onix Island!
episodes.plot: When our heroes take a break from special training, a mysterious island offers much more than they bargained for!

episodes.title: The Mystery of the Missing Cubchoo!
episodes.plot: As our heroes train for the upcoming Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a worried neighbor of Cynthia's comes by for help!

episodes.title: Iris and the Rogue Dragonite!
episodes.plot: While our heroes continue preparations for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a sudden emergency and a Pokémon in need change their lives forever!

episodes.title: Jostling for the Junior Cup!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off to a roaring start, while our heroes are faced with rivals old and new!

episodes.title: Battling Authority Once Again!
episodes.plot: The second round of the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off and running, while a battle between the winner and Alder waits in the wings!

episodes.title: Ash, Iris and Trip: Then There Were Three!
episodes.plot: The exciting Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup continues, and the semi-finals and finals hang in the balance of the results of these last two matches!

episodes.title: Goodbye, Junior Cup - Hello Adventure!
episodes.plot: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup may be winding down, but new adventures are just beginning!

episodes.title: The Road to Humilau!
episodes.plot: Our heroes' new friend Cameron needs to win his eighth Gym badge in order to enter the Unova League, and that sets the stage for an unforgettable adventure!

episodes.title: Unrest at the Nursery!
episodes.plot: While Ash trains for entry into the Unova League, our heroes discover a Pokémon nursery that urgently needs their help!

episodes.title: Meloetta and the Undersea Temple!
episodes.plot: A sinister plot to take over the Unova region is taking shape, and our heroes are caught in the middle of it!

episodes.title: Unova's Survival Crisis!
episodes.plot: Team Rocket's "Operation Tempest" is under way with a fierce vengeance, and the fate of the Unova region hangs in the balance!

episodes.title: Iris and Kibago!/To the Isshu Region! Zekrom's Shadow!
episodes.plot: Ash and his mother take a vacation with Professor Oak to the Unova region. A dark cloud reveals a mysterious Pokemon which affects Pikachu.

episodes.title: A Sandile Gusher of Change
episodes.plot: Ash and Iris try to help the owners of a Hot Sand Resort who are being plagued by Sandile.

episodes.title: Battle Club! A Mysterious Pokémon Appears!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Iris stop at a Battle Club for some training. Ash's battle is interrupted by Team Rocket and a mysterious Pokemon.

episodes.title: Sanyou Gym! Vs Baoppu, Hiyappu and Yanappu!!
episodes.plot: Ash arrives at the Striaton Gym for his first battle. The three gym leaders offer Ash a choice for the battle. Ash requests a battle with all three leaders.

episodes.title: Site of Dreams! Munna and Musharna!
episodes.plot: Ash's battle concludes. Cilan, impressed with Ash's victory, decides to journey with Ash to become a better connoisseur. Part of Team Rocket's plan is revealed.

episodes.title: Tsutarja: Attracted by Capture!?
episodes.plot: Ash and company encounter a wild Snivy with some really powerful attacks. They suspect it left its previous trainer. Ash is determined to catch the Snivy.

episodes.title: Darumakka and Hihidaruma! The Secret of the Clock Tower!!
episodes.plot: Ash and company encounter a pair of Darumakas who steals food. They soon find they're bringing it to their friend who is psychically supporting a bell. Team Rocket's plans continue.

episodes.title: Out of Control Pendra! Rescue Kibago!
episodes.plot: Iris has a training battle with Cilan, and her past is explored.

episodes.title: Rival Battle! Strong Opponent Pururiru!
episodes.plot: Ash challenges Trip to a full Pokemon battle.

episodes.title: A Home for Dwebble!
episodes.plot: Ash and company encounter a Dweeble who has his shell stolen from him by other Dweeble. They aide him reclaiming his home.

episodes.title: The Yabukuron Squad and the Secret Base!?
episodes.plot: Ash and company meet some children who have adopted a Trubbish. But their teacher disapproves of their Pokemon.

episodes.title: Chillarmy Is a Neat Freak!?
episodes.plot: Ash and company meet Bianca, Professor Juniper's helper. She gives Ash a badge case, which is promptly stolen by a Minccino. Now the group tries to catch the Pokemon

episodes.title: Shippou City! Big Adventure at the Museum!!
episodes.plot: Arriving in Nacrene City, our Heroes discover the Gym has a most unusual location and situation!

episodes.title: The Battle According to Lenora!
episodes.plot: The day for Ash's Nacrene City Gym Battle challenge is here, and Lenora isn't about to go easy on our Hero!

episodes.title: Shippou Gym Rematch! Explosive New Move!!
episodes.plot: After some special training, Ash challenges Lenora to re-match.

episodes.title: The Wild Child That Hatched from the Egg!
episodes.plot: Ash's Pokemon egg finally hatches revealing a Scraggy.

episodes.title: Yaguruma Forest! Kurumiru and Arti!!
episodes.plot: Ash and company get lost in Pinwheel Forest and encounter a wild Swaddle and Burgh, the next gym leader Ash wants to challenge.

episodes.title: A Connisseuer's Revenge
episodes.plot: The adventurers encounter a Pokemon Connisuser who insists that Ash replace all his Pokémon. They soon discover she has a past with Cilan. And a Pokemon battle ensues.

episodes.title: Pikachu vs Meguroco vs Koaruhie!!
episodes.plot: A previously encountered Sandile wants to battle Ash's Pikachu. But their battle is interrupted by some wild Duckletts.

episodes.title: The Lost World of Gothitelle!
episodes.plot: The adventurers cross a foggy bridge and seemingly into the past where they meet a young girl and her Gotitelle.

episodes.title: Hiun City! Fushide Panic!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers arrive in Castilla City and find that it's overrun with Venipede.

episodes.title: Hiun Gym Match! Purehearted Bug PokéMon Battle!!
episodes.plot: Ash battles Burgh for his third badge.

episodes.title: Beware of Cute Faces! Emonga Paralyzes!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes, along with their old friend Bianca, continue toward the Nimbasa Gym, they come across a Pokémon that Bianca just has to catch.

episodes.title: Emonga vs Tsutarja! The Volt Change Chaos!!
episodes.plot: As our heroes continue toward Nimbasa City, Iris's new friend Emolga proves just how amazing and unpredictable a Pokémon can be.

episodes.title: The Scary Story of the Hitomoshi Mansion!
episodes.plot: While taking cover from the rain, the adventurers encounter Team Rocket and some seemingly helpful Litwick.

episodes.title: The Road to Become a Dragon Master! Kibago VS Crimgan!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet Emmy, a trainer who has yet to start her journey. Iris reveals her dream to be a Dragon Master.

episodes.title: The Missing Hotachi! Mijumaru's Biggest Crisis Ever!!
episodes.plot: During a battle with another trainer, Oshawott loses his scalchop, causing Oshawott to run off to search for it mid-battle.

episodes.title: The Monmen in Love Rides the Wind!
episodes.plot: The adventurers try to help a wild Cottonee who's having during its mating season.

episodes.title: Ligray and the UFO!
episodes.plot: The adventurers spot a UFO and encounter Professor Icarus, an expert on the subject.

episodes.title: Rival Battle! Vanipeti, Dokkora Compete in a Battle!!
episodes.plot: Ash and Trip have a 3-on-3 battle.

episodes.title: Gamagaru, Maggyo! Battle on the Waterfront!!
episodes.plot: Having learned why Oshuwott is having difficulty with Aquajet, Ash helps Oshuwott through special training.

episodes.title: Iris and Exadrill Against the Dragon Buster!
episodes.plot: Iris is challenged by Georgia - a Dragon Buster. Iris's past with Excadrill is revealed.

episodes.title: Dangoro! Let's Fire the Luster Cannon!!
episodes.plot: Ash attempts to capture a Roggenrola, but the battle is interrupted as they investigate Roggenrola's home and find Team Rocket.

episodes.title: Sommelier-Detective Dent! Tabunne Disappearance Case!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers encounter an Audino wandering aimlessly through a patch of fog. They soon find out the local town has been losing their Audinos. They offer to help find the missing Pokemon

episodes.title: Fossil Revival! Ancient Mysterious Bird Archeos!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet up with Doctors Juniper and Fennel as they work to bring back an ancient Pokemon from a fossil.

episodes.title: The Fishing Sommelier - Dent Appears!
episodes.plot: The adventurers enter a fishing competition unaware that the competition is being run by Team Rocket.

episodes.title: Movie Time! Zorua in 'The Legend of the Pokemon Knight'
episodes.plot: The adventurers make a movie.

episodes.title: Reunion Battles at Nimbasa
episodes.plot: Day one at the Nimbasa Battle Tournament, a time to meet up with old friends and rivals.

episodes.title: Fierce Fighting Don Battle! Tsutarja VS Komatana!!
episodes.plot: Day two of the battle tournament.

episodes.title: Climactic Don Battle! Emonga VS Dageki!!
episodes.plot: Round 2 of the competition continues.

episodes.title: Decisive Don Battle! Satoshi VS Iris!!
episodes.plot: The final round of the tournament: Ash vs Iris.

episodes.title: Nyagotiator Nyarth! Zuruzukin Persuasion Tactics!!
episodes.plot: Axew is kidnapped by a wild Scrafty who demands the adventurers train him for a battle. The get some unexpected help from Meowth who has just been fired from Team Rocket.

episodes.title: Purrloin: Sweet or Sneaky?
episodes.plot: The adventurers encounter a Purrloin who claims it needs their help.

episodes.title: Ohbem and Doublan and the Dream Thief!
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet Beheeyem, a Pokemon that can make dreams come true. They soon become trapped in a dream world and must find a way to escape.

episodes.title: Nyagotiator Nyarth! Break Through Tunbear Forest!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers rescue a Cubchew that got separated from its pack. They soon get in the middle of a feud between two groups of Beartic.

episodes.title: Flat-out Run! Battle Subway!! - Part 1
episodes.plot: Team Rocket executes their plan. They manage to steal several Pokemon, and use their "Ghost Train" to make their escape.

episodes.title: Flat-out Run! Battle Subway!! - Part 2
episodes.plot: The adventurers try to find Team Rocket's Ghost Train, and all the stolen Pokemon. Meanwhile Pikachu and Axchew try to free themselves and the other Pokemon.

episodes.title: Loud Roar! Jibacoil vs Metagross!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers come across two wild Pokemon, Magnezone and Metagross. The rampaging Pokemon wreak havoc on a nearby town.

episodes.title: Roaring Freezing Punch! Buoysel vs Barrierd!!
episodes.plot: Ash and company encounter a martial arts Pokemon trainer. He helps Ash and Weezil learn a new attack.

episodes.title: Get Fired Up, Kabigon! King of the Pokéthlon!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers encounter Daniel, a scientific Pokemon trainer. Daniel and Ash compete in a Pokemon Marathon.

episodes.title: The Curtain Rises! Pokémon Contest: Asatsuki Tournament!!
episodes.plot: Dawn enters the Daybreak Town Pokemon contest. A rival's Pokemon reminds Dawn of a painful childhood experience.

episodes.title: Double Battle! Vs Plusle & Minun!!
episodes.plot: Dawn competes in the finals at the Daybreak Town Contest for her fifth ribbon.

episodes.title: Explosive Evolution! Goukazaru!!
episodes.plot: Ash and company encounter Barry and Paul. Barry and Ash have a battle that's interrupted by Team Rocket with a new plan to take their Pokemon.

episodes.title: Pochama Goes Astray!
episodes.plot: Piplup after getting hit by Drago Meteor one too many times by Ash's Gible, Piplup gets frustrated when the adventurers try to boost Gible's confidence, and decides to run away.

episodes.title: Flint Sparks the Fire!
episodes.plot: Ash and company arrive at the Sunny Shore Gym. Where they find Voltner, the Gym Leader, has given up on battling.

episodes.title: Liftoff! Nagisa Tower!!
episodes.plot: Ash's gym battle with Volkner is interrupted when Team Rocket steals Sunnyshore Tower.

episodes.title: The Beach Pokémon School!
episodes.plot: Dawn's mother is supposed to teach a beginner's Pokemon Coordinator class, but gets called away to judge a nearby contest. The young adventurers teach her class.

episodes.title: Fly, Shaymin! Far Into the Sky!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers encounter Marley, a trainer who's trying to get a wild Chaymin to its area in time for it's blooming journey.

episodes.title: Pokemon Ranger: Heatran Rescue Mission
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet Ranger Ben. He has lost his Pokemon Capture Styler, and asks for their help to bring a Heatran to a Pokemon Reserve.

episodes.title: Kikuno of the Four Heavenly Kings! Kabarudon vs Dodaitose!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet Roland a young trainer who falls victim to Team Rocket's latest ploy. They also meet Bertha, one of the Elite Four.

episodes.title: Togekiss Dance! The Princess's Pokémon Contest!!
episodes.plot: A princess asks Dawn to trade places for a day, so that the princess may compete in a Pokemon contest.

episodes.title: Togekiss! The Magnificent Battle!!
episodes.plot: Dawn begins training her new acquired Togekiss.

episodes.title: Metamon: Transformation Battle! Which One Is the Real One!?
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet Narissa. A trainer who has a lot to learn about Pokemon.

episodes.title: The Grand Festival Begins! The Art of Flame and Ice!!
episodes.plot: Contestants arrive for the Grand Festival. Rivals and friends gather for the competition. One competitor makes an unexpected early exit.

episodes.title: Mammoo, Pachirisu! Decide on the Ice Chandelier!!
episodes.plot: Day 2 of the Grand Festival. Dawn faces off against Ursala.

episodes.title: The Semi-Finals! Who Is Heading to the Finals!?
episodes.plot: Semi-final battles at the Grand Festival. With Nando vs Zoey. Then Dawn vs Jessilina.

episodes.title: Decisive Rival Showdown! Hikari vs Nozomi!!
episodes.plot: The Grand Festival finals. Dawn vs Zooey in the for title of Top Coordinator.

episodes.title: Goodbye Rocket-dan! Love of Nyarth!?
episodes.plot: Meowth meets and falls for a Glameowth. He ready to quit Team Rocket to be with her.

episodes.title: Electric Shock Battle! The Final Badge!!
episodes.plot: Ash battles Voltner for his eighth and final badge.

episodes.title: Satoshi vs Kengo! Sailing for Respective Roads!!
episodes.plot: The adventurers miss their ship and have to wait a day before continuing their journey. They meet up with old friends. Dawn receives and unexpected invitation, and all of them start to contemplate the next part of their journey.

episodes.title: Treasure Hunter: Baku & Yajilon!
episodes.plot: The adventurers meet Buck, a treasure hunter, and help him on his latest venture.

episodes.title: Eve of Battle! Satoshi's Pokémon All Together!!
episodes.plot: Ash asks Professor Oak to send him some of his old Pokemon for the upcoming competition. Team Rocket intercepts the Pokemon, now Ash must find and recover his Pokemon.

episodes.title: Raise the Curtain! Shin'o League: Suzuran Tournament!!
episodes.plot: Round one of the Sinnoh League Championship. Ash vs Nando.

episodes.title: Shin'o League Third Round! Shinji vs Jun!!
episodes.plot: Paul vs Barry in round 3.

episodes.title: Trick Room of Terror! Satoshi vs Kohei!!
episodes.plot: Ash vs Conway in Round 4.

episodes.title: Rival Decisive Battle! Satoshi vs Shinji!!
episodes.plot: Quarter finals begin. Ash vs Paul, part 1.

episodes.title: A Real Rival Rouser
episodes.plot: After Ash's early lead, Paul begins his counter attack.

episodes.title: Full Battle! Shinji vs Satoshi!!: Part Two
episodes.plot: Ash vs Paul part 3. The battle of these arch-rivals concludes with the winner advancing to the semi-finals.

episodes.title: The Semi-Final Frontier!
episodes.plot: Ash battles Tobias in the semi-finals. Tobia has only used his Darkrai in all his previous matches. Can Ash find a way to defeat Darkrai and what of the rest of Tobias's Pokemon?

episodes.title: Pokémon Doctor: Takeshi!
episodes.plot: On the way back to Twin Leaf Town, several Pokemon are injured. With no Pokemon Doctor on board, Brock does everything he can to help the Pokemon until support arrives.

episodes.title: Memories Are Made of Bliss!
episodes.plot: Ash and Brock spend the night at Dawn's house as they prepare for their return to their respective homes. It's a time of farewell. Brock makes a surprise announcement. The three friends part to pursue their own individual dreams.
